Bokor Master

Please select the user requiring a quest: So you are curious about this stone slate. {nl}If you wish, I shall show you the will of its creator.
Kamu ingin tahu tentang batu slate ini?  {nl} Aku akan memberikan penglihatan dari sang pembuat slate ini.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Goddess Laima
Goddess Laima

Please select the user requiring a quest: By the time you get this message, much time will have passed. {nl}I am Laima, the goddess of fate and wisdom.
Seiring dengan waktu kamu melihat wahyu ini, akan memakan waktu yang panjang.  {nl} Aku adalah Laima,  Goddess of Fate and Wisdom.  {nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: 600 years ago while creating this revelation, I foresaw a great deal of death and suffering. {nl}If you are seeing this, then I am afraid what I foresaw has come to pass.
Saat aku membuat wahyu ini sekitar 600 tahun lalu, Aku melihat banyak kesedihan dan kematian.  {nl} Jika kamu sudah melihat wahyu ini berarti semua yang aku ramalkan telah menjadi kenyataan.  {nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: The demons have started the first of cataclysms, and the goddesses have vanished. {nl}I knew all of this would occur and did everything I could to prevent this fate, but my power was not enough.
Bencana yang pertama disebabkan oleh Demon, dan semua Goddess akan menghilang.  {nl} Aku sudah tahu akan semua ini dari awal dan mencoba untuk mencegahnya, namun kekuatanku tidak cukup.  {nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: Instead, I wandered through far-seeing dreams for an answer. {nl}You were at the end of them... a Savior.
Aku melewati banyak mimpi demi mendapatkan jawaban.  {nl} Dan akhirnya aku memimpikan tentang dirimu.. The Savior.  {nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: Unfortunately, the demons could not stay still, knowing that I possess strength in clairvoyance. {nl}I was forced to hide until the time of your appearance.
Namun bagaimanapun, mengetahui kekuatanku yang dapat meramal takdir, para Demon tidak akan membiarkanku begitu saja  {nl}jadi aku harus bersembunyi agar dapat bertemu dirimu.  {nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: I decided to divide my being and remain within many revelations. {nl} Revelations that I continued to create secretly over a millennium.
Aku memutuskan untuk membagi diriku sendiri menjadi beberapa buah wahyu.  {nl} Membuatnya dan menyembunyikan diriku di sekitar area kerajaan selama ribuan tahun.  {nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: Savior, if you can help me regain my form, we can stop the demons' sinister plans.{nl}You must recover the revelations that I have hidden throughout every axes of time.
Untuk Savior.  {nl} demi aku dan menghentikan para Demon,  {nl}kamu harus menemukan seluruh wahyu melewati ruang dan waktu.

Please select the user requiring a quest: This divine task may be a heavy burden, but it is something you must bear. {nl}Perhaps in the muddy midst of your trials and tribulations, something may come about.
Beban dari tugas yang suci ini mungkin akan cukup memberatkanmu.  {nl} .  {nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: Nevertheless, only we can save this world.
Namun, hanya kamu dan aku yang bisa menyelamatkan dunia. {nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: I have passed the next revelation to the first Paladin. {nl}He will be waiting for you at the highest flower garden.
Aku telah memberikan wahyu berikutnya pada paladin pertama. {nl}Aku akan menunggumu di taman yang berada di bukit.

Please select the user requiring a quest: The dark aura is indeed unpleasant... {nl}But if this message is truly from the Goddess Laima, then I am simply in awe.
Akan datang pasukan iblis dan aku tidak bisa merasakannya.  {nl} Pasti, ini adalah wahyu asli dari Goddess Laima  .. Sungguh luar biasa.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Well, you should hurry and go find Sir Uska. {nl}He will tell you where to go next. {nl}May the goddess bless your fate...
Baiklah, cepat pergi temui Sir Uska. {nl}Dia akan memberitahu kemana kamu harus pergi. {nl}Semoga Goddess bless menyertai takdirmu..

Please select the user requiring a quest: Please select the preferred Smart Gen.
Silahkan pilih smart gen yang di inginkan.

William

Please select the user requiring a quest: The fee's 100 silver. {nl}It's cheaper than cutting through monster central.
Semua jadi 100 Silver. {nl}Ini sudah cukup murah dibandingkan harus menuju ke sekumpulan monster.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Cyneburg
Cyneburg

Please select the user requiring a quest: That'll be 100 silver coins. {nl}That'll cover operations, labor, and other expenses.
Totalnya jadi 100 Silver. {nl}Ini semua termasuk biaya operasi, usaha dan biaya lain-lain.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Hey, wait a minute. {nl}You know you need more than that...
Hey..tunggu dulu. {nl}Kamu butuh lebih dari itu..

Please select the user requiring a quest: That's no good! {nl}I can't work for nothing, even for a Revelator.
Ini tidak baik. {nl}Meskipun kamu seorang Savior, Aku tidak bisa bekerja untukmu.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Wandering Merchant
Wandering Merchant

Please select the user requiring a quest: Like a dandelion's seeds, I am merely one who follows the wind. {nl}Since we've met in such a curious way, perhaps you could spare a moment to view my curiosities?
Aku sangat miskin, wandering merchant. {nl}Baiklah, karena kita sudah bertemu, apakah kamu mau melihat barang daganganku?

Please select the user requiring a quest: Kristina
Christina

Please select the user requiring a quest: Welcome! {nl}You're looking for a travel companion, right? {nl}You won't find a better place for partners than here!
Selamat datang kawan.  {nl} Apakah kamu mencari teman untuk bertualang?  {nl} Tidak ada Companion yang lebih baik dari mereka.

Please select the user requiring a quest: You can make your companions watch you fight or train special attributes. {nl}Earn enough affection, and you can even buy some cool equipment!
Kamu dapat membuat companion membantu pertarunganmu atau melatihnya dengan special Attribute.  {nl} Jika hubungan kamu sudah sangat baik, kamu bisa membelikannya equipment yang keren.  {nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: Raising your companion's affection will increase riding stamina and evasion! {nl}So what do you think? Is that enough to make you consider one?
Companion yang tumbuh dengan kasih sayang dari kamu akan memberi bonus stamina dan evasion pada masternya.  {nl} Bagaimana menurutmu? Bukankah Companion baik untukmu?

Kamu membutuhkan key untuk box.

Knight Titas

Please select the user requiring a quest: If so, go see Knight Commander Uska in Klaipeda. {nl}But first, I have an important errand I would like to run you by, so follow me.
Jika begitu, temui Knight Commander Uska di Klaipeda.  {nl} Tapi sebelum itu, aku ingin memberitahu sesuatu, ikuti aku.

Please select the user requiring a quest: It would be nice if I could find a moment to relax...
Semoga aku punya sedikit waktu untuk istirahat..

Please select the user requiring a quest: Sparnas... {nl}is not someone to take lightly...
Sparnas.. {nl}Sangat sulit ditebak..

Please select the user requiring a quest: Soldier Moody
Soldier Moody

Please select the user requiring a quest: Let's deal with this monster before talking.
Kita lanjutkan bicaranya setelah mengalahkan monster.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Joint Investigation Team - Scott
Bergabung dengan tim investigasi - Scott.

Please select the user requiring a quest: I long for a time when our team is no longer needed... {nl}What a peaceful age that would be...
Aku menunggu hari dimana tim kita tidak dibutuhkan lagi.. {nl}Ah, Maksudku adalah hari yang damai. Haha.. {nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: I don't know where to start. {nl}Have you heard anything?
Aku tidak tahu harus berbuat apa. {nl}Apakah kamu sudah mendengar kabar?

Please select the user requiring a quest: By royal orders, we've come to this forest to investigate some strange events. {nl}Witnesses have reported something with a big face and bony fingers. {nl}What in the world could that be?
Kami dikirim oleh kerajaan untuk menginvestigasi kejadian aneh yang ada di hutan.  {nl} Para saksi bilang mereka melihat wajah raksasa dengan jari yang besar  {nl} Kira-kira apa itu?

Please select the user requiring a quest: In the past, pilgrims traveled through this forest. {nl}But now due to the presence of monsters, only soldiers gather here.
Dulu, para peziarah sering melewati hutan ini. {nl}Tetapi, sekarang, yang ada hanya monster.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Up until four years ago, the goddesses often blessed us with signs of their presence. {nl}But now, even our combined prayers don't bring so much as a tremor. {nl}Have they truly abandoned us?
4 tahun yang lalu, para Goddess sering menampakkan diri mereka dari waktu ke waktu.  {nl} Tapi sekarang, mereka tidak pernah muncul meskipun kita sering berdoa.  {nl} Apakah mereka mengabaikan kita?

Please select the user requiring a quest: Vacenin personally goes to each region to deal with things. {nl}He gets uncomfortable when he stays in the city.
Vecenin mengurus banyak tugas dengan pergi dari satu daerah ke daerah lainnya.  {nl} Dia bilang sangat tidak efektif jika hanya tinggal di satu kota.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Do you plan on staying or enlisting? {nl}If you're interested, I'll gladly recommend you to the head commanders.
Apakah kamu pernah berpikir untuk tinggal terus di sini atau menjadi prajurit?  {nl} Dengan senang hati aku akan merekomendasikanmu ke head commander.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Don't let your guard down. Monsters can appear any time, anywhere.
Tetap siaga. Kamu tidak akan tahu kapan dan dimana monster datang menyerang.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Where in the world did Goddess Zemyna go...
Aku membayangkan dimana Goddess Zemyna berada..

Please select the user requiring a quest: What in the world do you call this?
Sebenarnya ini apa ya?

Please select the user requiring a quest: I think Zemyna, the goddess of the earth would grieve more than anyone else.
Sepertinya The Goddess of Earth - Zemyna akan sangat sedih dibandingkan siapapun.

Please select the user requiring a quest: The Pokubu have always been here, but sometimes unfamiliar monsters are spotted as well.
Pokubu sudah berada di sini sejak lama.  {nl} Namun monster yang tidak jelas juga muncul di sekitarnya.

Please select the user requiring a quest: I've thought about it. There's no doubt that the goddesses have abandoned us all. {nl}If that weren't so, then there wouldn't be so many monsters.
Aku berpikir tentang itu. Para Goddess telah mengabaikan kita. {nl}Jika tidak, pasti tidak ada monster sebanyak itu.

Please select the user requiring a quest: They say there's a man blessed with the goddess' strength living in the forest.
Aku dengar ada orang yang tinggal di hutan dekat sini yang menerima kekuatan dari Goddess..

Please select the user requiring a quest: I want to go home.
Aku ingin kembali ke kampung halamanku.

Please select the user requiring a quest: The number of monsters here doesn't seem to change no matter how many of them we kill.
Jumlah dari monster sepertinya tidak berkurang walau sudah kita bunuh.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Did Julian send you off, Revelator?
Savior, Apakah Julian yang mengirimmu?

Please select the user requiring a quest: I'm amazed. {nl}You're the first person I've met here in several years.
Tidak mungkin. {nl}Kamu adalah orang pertama yang aku temui setelah beberapa tahun di hutan ini. {nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: I'll show you what I saw.
Aku akan menunjukkan apa yang aku lihat.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Please, forget about me and just leave. {nl}The flowers seem to be coming along beautifully.
Pergilah dan jangan hiraukan diriku. {nl}Ah, bunga-bunga yang indah mulai muncul.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Lena
Lena

Please select the user requiring a quest: Please, tell me your life story. {nl}We follow the will of Vibora and record all that is in this world.
Ceritakan aku tentang pengalamanmu.  {nl} Seperti kata Vivora, kami mencatat semua yang terjadi didunia.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Henrika
Henryka

Please select the user requiring a quest: Hello! {nl}Welcome to the Klaipeda branch of the Magic Association. {nl}We specialize in studying the strange phenomena that occur when special items are combined.
Halo. Ini adalah Magical Association's cabang Klaipeda.  {nl} Kami mempelajari hal misterius yang terjadi ketika spesial item dikombinasikan.

Please select the user requiring a quest: There's nothing to see here but steam and Vubbes. {nl}Wait, what's that thing with the big face that's approaching?!
Hanya ada uap dan Vubbes di sini.  {nl} Sesosok wajah besar muncul.. Kira-kira apa ya?

Please select the user requiring a quest: The land needs our attention as well. {nl}The world still isn't ruined... right?
Aku harus menyadarkan diri. {nl} Dunia belum berakhir.. Bukan begitu?

Please select the user requiring a quest: If we continue to have courtesy, then we still know the way of a righteous life. {nl}We should all consider whether or not this mess is our fault because we relied on the goddesses for everything.
Saat kebaikan berlanjut, orang percaya akan mendapat kebaikan. {nl}Mungkin fakta yang ada jika kita terlalu bergantung kepada Goddess juga tidak baik bagi kita.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Bulletin Board
Bulletin Board

Please select the user requiring a quest: Welcome to the mining town of Klaipeda!
Selamat datang di kota Tambang Klaipeda!

Please select the user requiring a quest: Indifferent Widow
Indifferent Widow

Please select the user requiring a quest: I'm not sure I understand it completely, but what I'm sure of is that the goddesses didn't disappear all at once.
Aku tidak tahu alasannya  {nl} Tetapi satu hal yang pasti bahwa para Goddess tidak menghilang secara bersamaan.

Please select the user requiring a quest: The first to disappear was the Goddess Gabija. {nl}I heard it was a very long time ago. {nl}One by one, starting with Gabija, they stopped replying.
Goddess pertama yang menghilang adalah Goddess Gabija.  {nl} Aku mendengar hal itu sejak lama.  {nl} Lalu setelah itu, satu per satu Goddess lain mulai tidak merespon.  {nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: Goddess Vakarine left us shortly before Medzio Diena. {nl}Both Zemyna and Ausrine disappeared soon after. {nl}It's already been four years since.
Goddess Vakarine telah menghilang sebelum Divine Day. {nl}Zemyna dan Ausrine adalah yang terakhir namun juga menghilang. {nl}Semua terjadi empat tahun lalu. {nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: That's right. The strangest one of all was the Goddess Laima. {nl}No one's really sure when she disappeared.
Itu benar. Goddess Laima itu yang paling ganjil.  {nl} Tidak ada yang tahu kapan dia menghilang.  {nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: Besides, isn't Laima the goddess of fate and foresight? {nl}She probably knew all about it.
Bukankah Goddess Laima adalah Goddess dari takdir dan kebijaksanaan?  {nl} Harusnya dia tahu semua yang akan terjadi ya kan?

Please select the user requiring a quest: Resting Soldier
Resting Soldier

Please select the user requiring a quest: I used to be an adventurer like you. Then I took an arrow in the knee...
Dulu aku juga seorang petualang seperti dirimu, namun setelah aku terkena panah itu.. {nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: It doesn't matter. Come and face me, you monsters!
Itu tidak penting. Hadapi aku monster!

Please select the user requiring a quest: A goddess appeared in my dream just now... {nl}It was so enchanting...
Para Goddess ada di dalam mimpiku.. {nl}Itu sangat mempesona..

Please select the user requiring a quest: Still, I have a duty to defend the kingdom. That's why I'm here.
Aku mempunyai tugas untuk melindungi kerajaan ini. Itulah mengapa aku ada di sini.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Uska is an old friend of mine.
Uska adalah kawan lamaku.  {nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: We did our tests to become knights together. Uska got to where he is now with my sincere support. {nl}Oh, those were some crazy days... It'd be nice to see him again.
Kami menjalani ujian menjadi knights bersama, dan Uska menjadi seperti sekarang karena bantuanku. {nl}Ha ha, Masa lalu yang menyenangkan..Aku merindukanmu Uska!

Please select the user requiring a quest: Just don't believe everything he says. {nl}He was known for being quite the show-off back home.
Jangan terlalu mempercayai perkataannya. {nl}Dia dikenal sebagai penipu ulung di desa kami.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Me? I find it funny, so I just leave him alone.
Aku? Aku hanya meninggalkanya karena itu menyenangkan.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Uh, wait. I take back what I said about not believing all he says.
Umm.. Aku tarik perkataanku untuk tidak mempercayainya. {nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: Everything that flies out of his mouth is a lie. Don't trust him.
Semua yang dia katakan adalah bohong, jangan mempercayainya.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Siauliai Guard
Siauliai Guard

Please select the user requiring a quest: There are monsters beyond this point. Be careful.
Di luar batas ini terdapat banyak monster, berhati-hatilah.

Please select the user requiring a quest: These woods aren't exactly peaceful, but it's better than other places. {nl}There are forests that have nothing but souls roaming about.
Tempat ini tidak begitu damai tapi setidaknya lebih baik daripada daerah lain.  {nl} Di hutan lain, tidak ada orang, yang ada hanya spirit berterbangan.

Please select the user requiring a quest: This is what people who have seen a goddess in their dreams are being called.
Orang-orang sepertimu yang bermimpi tentang Goddess, kami menyebutnya Savior.  {nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: I thought the Revelators' visions were madness at first. {nl}After all, the goddesses have been gone for a long time.
Pertama kali aku pikir para Savior itu gila.  {nl} Itu mulai terjadi semenjak para Goddess menghilang.  {nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: Isn't it true that the goddesses haven't responded to any of our prayers since Medzio Diena four years ago?
Setelah semua itu, mereka tidak pernah menjawab kami sejak 4 tahun lalu.

Please select the user requiring a quest: You can find Class Masters all around the kingdom. {nl}Why don't you visit them and learn what you can?
Master dari tiap class berada diseluruh penjuru kerajaan.  {nl} Kenapa kamu tidak mencoba belajar dari mereka?

Please select the user requiring a quest: You don't know about Medzio Diena? You must have come from really far away. {nl}Four years ago, things went out of control at the capital.
Kamu tidak tahu Medzio Diena? Kamu pasti baru di area ini.  {nl} Itu adalah hari dimana divine monument di kota bagian tengah mulai kacau.  {nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: It was a disaster... Many people were either injured or killed. {nl}Once gentle creatures turned fierce and many new monsters emerged.
Itu adalah bencana yang membuat penduduk terluka dan mati.  {nl} Bahkan monster yang baik menjadi jahat dan muncul monster lainnya.  {nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: If you are still interested about what happened on Medzio Diena four years ago, try visiting Klaipeda. {nl}Many of its survivors took refuge there.
Pergilah ke Klaipeda jika kamu penasaran yang terjadi dengan Divine Tree 4 tahun lalu.  {nl} Banyak korban selamat pergi ke sana.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Eastern Woods Sentinel
Easter Woods Sentinel

Please select the user requiring a quest: Are you heading to the Eastern Woods? {nl}You mustn't! It's far too dangerous!
Apa kamu mencoba masuk ke Easter Woods? {nl}Jangan pernah ke sana. Terlalu berbahaya! {nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: Damn, those stubborn things chased us this far!
Uh, Mereka sangat keras kepala..!!

Please select the user requiring a quest: Those screams... We're under attack!
Teriakan ini... Kita diserang!

Please select the user requiring a quest: Safety Instructions
Peraturan keamanan

Please select the user requiring a quest: 1. Only authorized personnel may enter. {nl}2. Always follow the directions of the mining supervisor.
1. Hanya personil yang terdaftar yang bisa masuk.  {nl} 2. Hanya boleh melewati jalur yang di berikan Mine Director.  {nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: 3. Do not approach closed-off areas. {nl}4. Any suspicious individuals should be reported to the knights of Klaipeda.
3. Jangan memasuki daerah terlarang.  {nl} 4. Laporkan orang yang mencoba masuk ke Mine tanpa ijin ke Klaipeda Knight Templars.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Supply Base Soldier
Supply Base Soldier

Please select the user requiring a quest: I've never been in a real fight before so I'm a bit nervous.
Aku belum terbiasa dengan pertempuran nyata jadi aku agak sedikit gugup.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Farm Sentinel
Farm Sentinel

Please select the user requiring a quest: My colleague is in the middle of a battle at the Miners' Village. {nl}I've thought of going to help, but the Eastern Woods is in trouble as well, so all I can do is worry.
Temanku sedang bertempur di Miner's Village. {nl}Aku ingin membantunya, tapi East Forest juga sedang dalam masalah sehingga aku khawatir.

Please select the user requiring a quest: I think this mission has shown me enough monsters for a lifetime. {nl}It used to be just groups of Vubbes.
Aku pikir aku sudah melihat semua macam monster dalam hidupku.  {nl} Tapi ternyata itu hanya Vubbe.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Chupacabras are fond of the streams and lush vegetation of the northern area.
Chupacabra suka tinggal di dekat sungai dan daerah subur di arah utara.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Klaipeda Guard Captain
Klaipeda Guard Captain

Please select the user requiring a quest: You're the...
Kamu adalah..

Please select the user requiring a quest: It looks like you can see into the upper forest from here. {nl}Try not to get into trouble.
Aku dengar mereka terlihat di bagian dalam hutan atas.  {nl} Agar lebih aman, jangan mengusik mereka terlebih dahulu.

Please select the user requiring a quest: You don't have the required quest item. Are you sure you want to continue?
Kamu tidak memiliki item untuk melanjutkan quest. Apakah kamu ingin melanjutkan setelah membuat item?

Please select the user requiring a quest: Klaipeda Girl
Klaipeda Girl

Please select the user requiring a quest: My neighbor used to be a monster hunter. {nl}He's retired now though. It has gotten ferociously dangerous.
Pria itu adalah tetanggaku dan dulunya seorang monster hunter.  {nl} Tapi sekarang sudah berhenti karena monsternya semakin beringas dan berbahaya.

Please select the user requiring a quest: It would be nice if all these Revelators being here meant that the goddesses are back.
Aku harap kemunculan savior adalah pertanda dari kembalinya Goddess.

Please select the user requiring a quest: It might be silly to hope for the goddess' return, but it's better than nothing.
Hanya bergantung pada Goddess adalah hal yang bodoh,  {nl}namun lebih baik daripada tidak bergantung pada apapun.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Klaipeda Lady
Klaipeda Madam

Please select the user requiring a quest: We can still grow from the land, and have a warm hearth at our homes to rest at. {nl}I will always believe the goddesses are somewhere in the world.
Tanaman masih bisa tumbuh di tanah ini dan kita masih diberikan kehangatan di dalam rumah. {nl}Aku percaya bahwa Goddess masih ada di suatu tempat di dunia ini.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Keep faith. {nl}The goddesses may still send a Savior to us.
Tetaplah berdoa.  {nl} Agar Goddess mengirimkan seseorang untuk menyelamatkan kita.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Hoplite Master
Hoplite Master

Please select the user requiring a quest: If the sword is a symbol of power, then the spear is that of pure destruction. {nl}Power or destruction - what would you reach for on the battlefield?
Jika sword adalah lambang kekuasaan, maka spear adalah senjata untuk menghancurkan.  {nl} Kekuasaan dan senjata. Yang mana pilihanmu jika berada di medan pertempuran?

Please select the user requiring a quest: Machine Worker
Machine Worker

Please select the user requiring a quest: Even with the world as chaotic as it is, we can't stop working. {nl}It's been four years. Isn't it time to make peace with the past and start over?
Meskipun dunia sedang kacau, aku tidak bisa bersantai. {nl}Empat tahun telah berlalu, jadi kita harus tenang dan mulai dari awal.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Klaipeda is a town that lives off its mining. {nl}With Medzio Diena, we ought to work on planting trees or cutting them.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Archers should have Strength, but Dexterity will prevent problems with movement. {nl}You'll need to think about what to start with.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Then, my special device will activate. {nl}If you do as I did, you will be able to enter the tower as well.

Please select the user requiring a quest: A long, long time ago, there were nomads who suffered from a cursed plague. {nl}The honorable first Paladin removed the curse with a Holy Relic.

Please select the user requiring a quest: One day, the goddess requested the first Paladin to safeguard a divine revelation. {nl}The cursed nomads appeared just as the paladin mulled on how to keep it secret.
Suatu hari, Sang Goddess meminta kepada Paladin pertama untuk menjaga wahyu. {nl}Saat dia berpikir bagaimana cara menyembunyikannya, para pengembara yang terkutuk mulai muncul. {nl}

Untuk membangun Tenet Church bersama.  {nl}Untuk menyembunyikan Divine Water di tanah ini dan menyimpannya. {nl}Untuk bertempur bersama saat terjadi krisis di tanah ini. {nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: Anything can happen though. {nl}If the plan fails, then the final battle will likely happen in the Tenet Church.

There's talk about King Kadumel going after the general. {nl}Mood's not going to change soon.
Waktu telah berlalu 1 tahun setelah Perang sipil terjadi. harga barang di kota naik sungguh banyak. Jendral Ruklys mengatakan akan mendistribusikan persediaan yang dibutuhkan ke kota yang kekurangan. Tetapi Raja Kardumel yang mendengar berita baik ini, bermaksud mengincar Jendral Ruklys dan beredar kabar bahwa ia bermaksud pulang ke rumah, dan membuat keadaan dari orang-orang di sekitar menjadi tidak baik.

Raja Kardumel sambil mengontrol kerajaan, juga memperkuat penjagaan dari Post karena kondisi peperangan semakin kritis. Adalah benar Kardumel yang inkompeten memimpin banyak pasukan datang. Tetapi jika Jendral Hayatin memimpin pasukan bantuan datang, maka Kardumel akan menyerah atau melarikan diri.

Please select the user requiring a quest: King Kadumel is keen on persecuting the townspeople. {nl}The premier is pushing Commander Ruklys to negotiate terms ensuring that the civilians are safe from enemy forces. {nl}Despite the royal forces occupying the town, there has yet to be any threatening movement.

General Ruklys telah mati dan Great Earth Fortress hancur. Beberapa orang bilang dia mati terkena panah dari Lydia Schaffen's, yang lain bilang dia mati karena serangan magic dari royal magicians. Sudah bisa dipastikan dan itu berita yang menyedihkan.

Tidak terbuka.  {nl}Dimana kuncinya?

Please select the user requiring a quest: What's the story behind this? {nl}The entrapped soul simply gave the scriptures and vanished.
Apa yang bisa menjadi cerita dibalik semua ini?  {nl}Jiwa yang terjebak hanya memberi tulisan dan menghilang.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Does the medicine really work?
Apa obat ini benar-benar berguna?

Please select the user requiring a quest: Voice
Voice

Please select the user requiring a quest: (You sense something dubious inside.)
(Kamu merasakan sesuatu yang aneh di dalam.)

Please select the user requiring a quest: Worried Wife
Worried Wife

Please select the user requiring a quest: Have you ever had your fortune told? It is quite accurate, isn't it? {nl}Goddess Laima knows everything. Fate, foresight, and luck. {nl}I think she may have known beforehand about all these disasters coming.
Apa kamu pernah meramal? Hal ini cukup akurat bukan?  {nl} Goddess Laima tahu semuanya. Takdir, Masa depan, dan Keberuntungan.  {nl} Aku pikir dia sudah tahu sebelumnya soal semua bencana yang datang.

Please select the user requiring a quest: I pray to Goddess Gabija everyday. It keeps the house warm. {nl}As you may already know, Goddess Gabija controls fire and since I'm a housewife, I am close to fire as well.
Aku berdoa kepada Goddess Gabija setiap hari. Itu akan membuat rumahmu hangat.  {nl} Kanu harus tahu, Goddess Gabija mengontrol api dan sejak aku menjadi seorang istri, aku menjadi dekat dengan api juga.

Please select the user requiring a quest: My husband always prays to Goddess Zemyna. {nl}If you want a good potato harvest, you shouldn't get on her bad side. {nl}Goddess Zemyna is the goddess of the earth. She oversees farms and agriculture.
Suamiku selalu berdoa kepada Goddess Zemyna.  {nl} Jika kamu ingin panen kentangmu subur, kamu tidak boleh menaruhnya di tempat yang salah.  {nl} Goddess Zemyna adalah Goddess Of Earth. Dia juga mengawasi peternakan dan pertanian.  {nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: Speaking of which. {nl}About the plants overgrowing ever since Medzio Diena four years ago...
Berbicara tentang ..  {nl} Tentang proses mutasi tanaman sejak Medzio Diena 4 tahun yang lalu .. {nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: I wonder what Goddess Zemyna will think of it. {nl}Everything will be revealed when the goddess returns but... {nl}Oh, what blasphemous words I speak.
Aku berpikir bagaimana Goddess Zemyna akan memikirkannya.  {nl} Semuanya akan terungkap ketika Goddess kembali tetapi? {nl}Oh, kata hujatan apa yang Aku ucapkan.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Have you ever seen the stars glittering red in the night sky? {nl}That's the very symbol of Goddess Vakarine. {nl}She leads the evening star and wakes Goddess Ausrine the following day.
Apa kamu pernah melihat bintang berkilap merah di langit malam?  {nl} Itu adalah simbol dari Goddess Vakarine.  {nl} Dia mengarahkan bintang malam dan membangunkan Goddess Ausrine di hari berikutnya  {nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: She also oversees energy and rest, so she is the guardian of travelers like you. {nl}Shout Goddess Vakarine's name three times when your legs hurt and you'll feel much better.
Dia juga mengawasi energi dan sisanya, jadi dia adalah penjaga petualang seperti kamu.  {nl} Panggil nama Goddess Vakarine sebanyak 3x ketika kakimu terluka dan kamu akan merasa baikan.  {nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: What are you doing here? {nl}Did the goddess also tell you to go to Klaipeda in your dreams?
)}Apa yang kamu lakukan disini?   {nl} Apakah para Goddess memintamu ke Klaipeda dalam mimpimu?

Please select the user requiring a quest: Still following me after all that? {nl}Fine, struggle all you want.
Masih mengikutiku setelah semua itu?  {nl}Baik, teruskan saja mau kalian.

Please select the user requiring a quest: There is a Mage Tower near Fedimian known to have been built by Archmage Agailla Flurry. {nl}The tower has never been revealed and no entrance can be found.
Ada sebuah Maze Tower dekat Fedimian yang dulu dibangun oleh Agailla Flurry.  {nl}Tower itu tidak pernah ditemukan dan tidak ada yang tahu pintu masuknya.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Well, that's why some say it's just a made up story... {nl}But recently there have been people claiming to have come from there.
Ya, ada yang bilang itu hanya bualanâ€¦ {nl}Namun belakangan ini banyak orang yang mengaku pernah pergi ke Maze Tower.

Please select the user requiring a quest: The size of Goddess Zemyna's Statue will amaze you. {nl}Even if half of it was buried underground because of the Great Earthquake, {nl}the remaining half would still be too huge for all of it to be seen at once.
Ukuran dari patung Goddess Zemyna Statue akan membuatmu tercengang.  {nl}Walaupun sebagian tubuh patung terpendam di tanah karena gempa dashyat.  {nl}Sisanya pun masih terlihat sangat besar untuk dilihat.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Welcome. I heard you were coming from Uska. {nl}Don't just stand there. I wish to have a word with you.
Selamat datang. Aku telah mendengarnya dari Uska.  {nl}Jangan hanya diam disitu. Aku ingin bicara denganmu.

Please select the user requiring a quest: So, you're the one who got the revelation from the Crystal Mine, right? {nl}If it's alright with you, I'd like to hear the details.
Jadi, kamu orang yang mendapatkan wahyu di Crystal Mines, hah?  {nl}Jika begitu, Aku ingin mengetahui tentang wahyu itu.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Amazing. {nl}We also follow the first Paladin's will and came here to guard this place. {nl}Same goes for the Watchers here.
Luar biasa.  {nl}Kami juga datang kesini untuk berjaga atas perintah Paladin pertama.  {nl}Sama seperti penjaga yang lain.

Please select the user requiring a quest: The first Paladin was told many things by the goddess. {nl}Threats of Gesti, things to abide by, and that a Savior would come.
Sang Paladin pertama mendapatkan banyak titah dari Goddess.  {nl}Ancaman dari Gesti, tugas suci, dan bahwa Savior akan datang.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Anyway, I will go back to battle so please help the guards and my followers. {nl}I'll meet you again in Jade-Filled Cliff.
Lagipula, Aku akan kembali ke pertempuran, jadi tolong bantu para guards dan pengikutku.  {nl}Kita bertemu lagi di Jade-Filled Cliff.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Disciple of the Elderly
Disciple of the Elderly

Please select the user requiring a quest: Helping reconstruct Fedimian may be more meaningful than pottery. {nl}But people need something to soothe their hearts.
Membantu kembali pembangunan Fedimian mungkin lebih berguna daripada membuat tembikar,  {nl}tapi orang-orang membutuhkan sesuatu untuk menenangkan hatinya.

Please select the user requiring a quest: I have also been placing clay tablets, scribed with people's wishes, inside the spiral of pots. {nl} To search for and read the little wishes from people of ancient times is quite enjoyable.
Terkadang, Aku membuat piring tembikar dengan tulisan doa dari orang lain.  {nl}Membaca doa-doa mereka cukup menyenangkan.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Fedimian Old Lady
Fedimian Old Lady

Please select the user requiring a quest: It's relieving to see the Holy District intact. {nl} All of this is due to a blessing from Goddess Zemyna.
Ini melegakan melihat Kawasan Suci baik-baik saja.  {nl}Ini semua ada berkat dari Goddess Zemyna.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Get the Token of Training from the Training Manager. {nl}I'll let you join our troop if you can pass the training.
Dapatkan Token of Training dari Training Manager.  {nl}Kamu bisa bergabung dengan pasukan kami jika bisa lulus latihan.

Please select the user requiring a quest: You should take responsibility for the troop's safety in the Training Camp. {nl}It'd be a bad idea to leave these excited young men without any supervision, right?
Kamu harus bertanggung jawab terhadap keselamatan para tentara di pusat pelatihan.  {nl}Ide buruk meninggalkan anak-anak muda yang bersemangat tanpa pegawasan, benar kan?

Please select the user requiring a quest: Uska told me about you. {nl}All the Revelators I've met so far were no better than the Kepas, though.
Uska bercerita tentang kamu.  {nl}Semua pewahyu yang kutemui tidak ada yang lebih baik dari pada Kepas.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Help the herbalists before you get into training. {nl}I need to see if you have what it takes to protect my troops. Training will come after.
Bantulah Herbalist sebelum masuk ke pelatihan.  {nl}Aku perlu melihat apakah kamu memiliki apa yang diperlukan untuk melindungi pasukanku. Setelah itu kamu bisa ke pelatihan.

Please select the user requiring a quest: My father told me Klaipeda is also becoming a difficult place to live.
Ayahku bilang kepadaku sekarang semakin sulit untuk tinggal di Klaipeda.

Please select the user requiring a quest: There are many people who want to buy things but it's not easy to get what they want. {nl}We have enough food supplies for now but it won't last long.
Orang-orang selalu ingin membeli sesuatu, tetapi sulit untuk mendapatkan yang mereka minta.  {nl}Kami mempunyai stok makanan yang cukup, tapi tidak akan bertahan lama.

Please select the user requiring a quest: I heard the town men can't make their way back because of the monsters. {nl}We have food but it will run out soon...
Aku dengar para pria tidak dapat kembali ke kota karena serangan monster.  {nl} Makanan masih ada namun stok kita semakin menipis..

Please select the user requiring a quest: How will we live if this continues to go on? {nl}Where have all the goddesses gone?
Bagaimana kita bisa bertahan hidup jika ini terus berlanjut?  {nl} Kemana para Goddess pergi?

Please select the user requiring a quest: It's a good idea to sell the various items you get from killing monsters, {nl}but using them to craft new items isn't such a bad idea either.
Menjual item dari monster adalah ide yang bagus.  {nl}Akan tetapi, menggunakannya untuk bahan craft juga berguna.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Although we need to be self-sufficient, things like recipes are better bought from the merchants. {nl}You need to know how to make it before you actually craft one yourself.
Meskipun kita harus berhemat, tapi item seperti recipes lebih baik beli dari merchant.  {nl} Karena kamu harus tau cara membuat item terlebih dahulu sebelum mencoba membuat.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Be sure to kill any sparkling monsters you encounter. You might get some great items as trophies. {nl}And what about buying me some drinks for the good information I just gave you?
Jika kamu melihat monster yang bersinar, pastikan untuk mengalahkannya.  {nl} Kamu mungkin mendapatkan item langka sebagai hadiah.  {nl} Dan jangan lupa untuk mentraktirku minuman karena sudah memberitahu kamu ya?

Please select the user requiring a quest: If you have any questions, head over to the Pyromancer Master's Laboratory. {nl}Thankfully, you can read a lot of books there for free.
Jika kamu punya pertanyaan, pergilah ke Pyromancer Master's Laboratory.  {nl} Sangat menarik, disana kamu bisa membaca banyak buku secara gratis.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Each Goddess Statue is known to have different abilities depending on which goddess it depicts. {nl}Strangely, though that Statue is not of Goddess Vakarine, it can still send you to your desired location.
Tiap patung Goddess mempunyai kekuatan tergantung dari Goddess mana itu.  {nl} Anehnya, itu bukanlah patung Goddess Vakarine tapi bisa memindahkanmu ke tempat lain.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Adventurer Varkis' Spirit
Soul of Explorer Varkis

Please select the user requiring a quest: If only I had a little more time... {nl}The data I've collected near the Dykyne Fork... I can't leave it...
Jika saja aku punya waktu sedikit lagi..  {nl}Data yang Aku kumpulkan dekat Dykyne crossroad..Aku tidak bisa meninggalkannya..

Please select the user requiring a quest: Now I can leave without any regrets. {nl}Goodbye. Be careful of that man...
Sekarang Aku bisa pergi tanpa penyesalan.  {nl} Selamat tinggal dan hati-hati dengan orang itu..

Please select the user requiring a quest: Use this scroll to open a niche of space and find the Key of the Great King. {nl}You'll never know what will pop out, so be careful.
Gunakan scroll ini untuk membuka beberapa ruang dan menemukan Key Of Great King. {nl}Kamu tidak akan pernah tahu apa yang akan terjadi jadi lebih baik hati-hati.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Crumbled Chapel
Crumbled Chapel

Please select the user requiring a quest: This is where a small chapel was once located. {nl}A Statue of Goddess Vakarine appears here once a day.
Di sinilah tempat dimana sebuah Chapel kecil pernah berada. {nl}Sebuah patung dari Goddess Vakarine muncul di sini sehari sekali.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Stamina can be recovered by destroying Tree Root Crystals.{nl}They are an abnormality that began to appear after Medzio Diena. {nl}But rest assured, because the research results have shown it's perfectly safe.
Stamina dapat dipulihkan dengan menghancurkan Tree Root Crystals.  {nl}Hal-hal aneh mulai muncul sejak Divine Day,  {nl} Namun penelitian mengatakan hal itu cukup aman.

Please select the user requiring a quest: So Degil sent you... Here... Here it is.
Jadi kamu dikirim oleh Degil .. Ini .. Ini dia..

Please select the user requiring a quest: The goddess taught us to help others. {nl}I'm just abiding by her teachings.
Goddess mengajarkan kita untuk menolong sesama.  {nl}Aku hanya mengikuti ajarannya.

Please select the user requiring a quest: I'd have just stood there if not for your help. {nl}My arms still hurt... {nl}I understand that the situation is not normal.
Aku akan berdiri disana jika tidak membantu kamu.  {nl}Tanganku masih sakitâ€¦  {nl}Yaa, aku sadar bahwa situasi ini cukup sulit.

Please select the user requiring a quest: The morning comes after the night goes. {nl}Goddess Ausrine is the one who leads the morning. {nl}Not only that, but she is also the one we meet after we die.
Cahaya mentari pagi bersinar setelah malam usai. {nl}Goddess Ausrine adalah Goddess yang melambangkan cahaya pagi.  {nl}Bukan hanya itu, kita juga menemuinya ketika kita meninggal.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Strange Goddess Statue
Strange Statue of Goddess

Please select the user requiring a quest: Come, angry resentful souls.
Datanglah, Jiwa yang penuh amarah.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Soldier Recruit Bran
Soldier Recruit Bran

Please select the user requiring a quest: You're the one who helped us a while ago.
Kamulah yang telah menolong kami dulu.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Training Manager Alius
Training Manager Alius

Please select the user requiring a quest: Stop!
Berhenti!

Please select the user requiring a quest: That's terrible. {nl}You'd be dead before you could be of any help on the battlefield.
Itu buruk.  {nl}Kamu bisa mati sebelum membantu di pertempuran.

Please select the user requiring a quest: If I meet the sculptor again, {nl}I'll ask him to decorate it with purple and green feathers!
Jika aku bertemu sculptor lagi  {nl}Aku akan memintanya menghias dengan Bulu Ungu dan Hijau!

Please select the user requiring a quest: Don't you think it would look great? {nl}Purple and green... Hehe.
Bukankah itu terlihat keren?  {nl}Ungu dan Hijauâ€¦ hehe.

Please select the user requiring a quest: The sculptor created us. And we received the goddess' revelation. Yep! He made us. {nl}We follow the sculptor's will to comfort the souls.
Sang sculptor membentuk kita, dan kita menerima wahyu goddes.  {nl}Kami menghibur jiwa-jiwa seperti yang dia inginkan.

Please select the user requiring a quest: The souls are great. They're like fireflies or beetles. {nl}It's wonderful just watching it. Like where the sculptor is.
Jiwa-jiwa itu sangat luar biasa. Seperti kunang-kunang atau kumbang.  {nl}Sangat indah untuk dilihat. Sama seperti seorang sculptor.

Please select the user requiring a quest: We can no longer be approve of Sequoia's actions. {nl}We owls will be destroyed if we leave him be. {nl}Who then will lead all the souls?
Tindakan Sequoia tidak bisa diterima.  {nl}Semua burung hantu bisa hancur jika kita tidak berbuat apa-apa.  {nl}Kalau itu terjadi siapa yang akan membimbing jiwa-jiwa itu?

Please select the user requiring a quest: I have been watching the abyssal darkness of this holy forest: things like the hatred and greed of humans.
Aku selalu melihat kegelapan di hutan yang suci ini.  {nl}Hal-hal seperti kebencian dan keserakahan manusia.

Please select the user requiring a quest: It's regrettable that we have to get rid of an old friend... {nl}But we can't just stand by and watch it do evil.
Sangat sedih jika kita harus menyingkirkan sahabat lamaâ€¦  {nl}Tapi kita tidak bisa diam saja melihat dia melakukan hal buruk.

Please select the user requiring a quest: I was almost destroyed by Sequoia but I can't just stop guiding the poor souls. {nl}When will this tragedy end?
Aku hampir terkena masalah karena Sequoia tapi aku tidak bisa berhenti membimbing jiwa-jiwa yang malang itu.  {nl}Kapankah ini akan berakhir?

Please select the user requiring a quest: I shall leave when the time comes. {nl}But until then, I will protect this place.
Jika saatnya tiba aku akan pergi.  {nl}Namun sebelum itu terjadi, Aku akan melindungi tempat ini.

Please select the user requiring a quest: There's still so many more things to research...
Masih banyak yang harus ditelitiâ€¦

Please select the user requiring a quest: Where are the others? {nl}The merchants? {nl}The soldiers? {nl}Where are the teachers?
Kemana perginya orang-orang?  {nl} Para Merchant? Para Prajurit? Juga dimana Para Guru?

Please select the user requiring a quest: I've never seen a Sequoia go crazy like that. {nl}We'll all be destroyed. We will become dust!
Aku tidak pernah melihat Sequoia mengamuk seperti itu.  {nl}Kita semua akan hancur. Akan menjadi debu!

Please select the user requiring a quest: Long ago, I befriended many humans. {nl}It's not a pleasant thing to meet your friends again as souls.
Dulu kala, Aku berteman dengan para manusia.  {nl}Rasanya sangat tidak nyaman bertemu teman lama dalam bentuk jiwa.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Isn't it cute? {nl}I was nervous when I first saw it, but it approached and cuddled me. {nl}It's so cute. I'm gonna have to take it home with me some day.
Bukankah ini sangat menggemaskan?  {nl}Aku merasa gugup saat pertama kali melihatnya, tapi dia menghampiriku langsung dan terlihat sangat manja.  {nl}Sangat menggemaskan. Suatu hari aku akan membawanya pulang.

Please select the user requiring a quest: It's not easy working in the woods, but it's better than the dried and weathered valley. {nl}I heard the wind there is hot. I don't want to go there.
Tidak mudah bekerja di hutan, tapi lebih baik daripada di bukit dengan iklim yang aneh.  {nl}Aku dengar disana anginnya cukup panas. Aku tidak ingin pergi kesana.

Please select the user requiring a quest: We always lack soldiers, but thankfully not eager, young men.
Kita kekurangan tenaga prajurit, tapi banyak generasi muda yang bersemangat.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Then what's the problem? {nl}We make soldiers, not coffins. {nl}You need strength to join the war, mere passion will just lead to defeat.
Lalu apa masalahnya?  {nl}Kita melatih prajurit, bukan peti mati.  {nl}Kamu butuh kekuatan dalam peperangan, semangat tidak bisa menjamin kemenangan.

Please select the user requiring a quest: The goddess is also indifferent... {nl}I still have a many things I want to do... But I was killed by the monster... {nl}Many others have also died, their belongings scattered around the forest.
Para Goddess juga acuh tak acuhâ€¦  {nl}Aku masih memiliki banyak hal yang ingin dikerjakanâ€¦ Tapi aku terbunuh oleh monsterâ€¦  {nl}Masih banyak lagi yang mati. Barang-barang milik mereka tersebar di penjuru hutan.

Please select the user requiring a quest: I don't have much memory of when I was alive. {nl}The monsters raided when the Owl Statue was about to guide me and then I was left alone. {nl}I hope there won't be other souls like me any more.
Aku tidak ingat banyak hal saat masih hidup.  {nl}Monster menyerang kesini saat Owl Statue sedang membimbingku lalu aku tertinggal sendiri.  {nl}Aku harap tidak ada lagi jiwa-jiwa yang tersesat sepertiku.

Please select the user requiring a quest: You are the chosen one. {nl}Do not forget that. {nl}The revelation is prepared for you. {nl}You need to get the revelation and carry on the will of goddess.
Kamu adalah orang terpilih.  {nl}Jangan lupakan itu.  {nl}Wahyu telah disiapkan untukmu.  {nl}Kamu harus mendapatkan wahyu itu dan menjalankan titah dari Goddess.

Please select the user requiring a quest: May the blessings of goddess be with you in your journey.
Semoga berkat dari Goddess menyertaimu dalam perjalanan ini.

Please select the user requiring a quest: You can get stamina by destroying Tree Root Crystals. {nl}It grows back after you destroy it. Weird, huh?
Kamu bisa mendapatkan stamina dengan menghancurkan Tree Root Crystals.  {nl}Mereka tumbuh lagi setelah kau hancurkan. Misterius bukan?

Please select the user requiring a quest: When the Divine Beast raged in the capital, I was born.
Saat Divine Beast mengamuk di capital, aku terlahir.

Please select the user requiring a quest: We are willing to accept additional requests but... {nl}If something like this were to happen without notice then... Phew...
Kami cukup fleksibel menerima permintaan lain tapiâ€¦  {nl}Jika sesuatu seperti ini terjadi tanpa pemberitahuanâ€¦ Phewâ€¦â€¦

Please select the user requiring a quest: Isn't Vacenin really nice? {nl}I really want to enlist in his unit but I can't find the right opportunity.
Vacenin sangat baik bukan?  {nl}Aku ingin mendaftar sebagai unit Vacenin, tapi aku berpikir mengapa sangat sulit mendapatkan kesempatan itu.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Well... It is better to meet people when they're alive than dead, you know?
Yahâ€¦ Lebih baik bertemu orang yang masih hidup daripada bertemu jiwa nya, kamu tahu?

Please select the user requiring a quest: I was waiting for the Owl Statue to guide me. {nl}But I saw a strong monster swallow a soul, so I hid. {nl}I barely saved myself but you must kill that monster to save the captured soul.
Aku menunggu Owl Statue untuk membimbingku.  {nl}Namun aku melihat monster menelan jiwa-jiwa lalu bersembunyi.  {nl}Aku berhasil bersembunyi, namun kamu harus membunuh monster tersebut untuk melepaskan jiwa yang terjebak di dalam.

Please select the user requiring a quest: I don't know about the other owls, but I still have hope. {nl}The goddess will not abandon us. {nl}Looking at the revelations left in the world, I'm sure she has plans for us. {nl}Please gather the scattered revelations.
Aku tidak tahu tentang Owl yang lainnya, namun aku masih punya harapan.  {nl}Goddess tidak akan mengabaikan kita.  {nl}Melihat wahyu-wahyu yang ditinggalkan mereka di dunia, Aku yakin dia punya rencana untuk kita.  {nl}Tolong kumpulkan wahyu yang tersebar.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Bramble's subordinates are still going wild. {nl}More people will die if this goes on. {nl}Please help the humans fighting against monsters.
Anak buah Bramble masih mengamuk.  {nl}Akan banyak korban bila tidak dihentikan.  {nl}Tolong bantu melawan monster itu demi umat manusia.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Well... Why am I still here? {nl}Maybe it's not yet my time to leave. {nl}No one knows, not the Owl Statue nor other souls. {nl}Unless it was the goddess who can see the future. No one knows their fate anyway, right?
Yaaâ€¦ Mengapa aku masih disini?  {nl}Mungkin bukan saatnya untuk pergi?  {nl}Tidak ada yang tahu, tidak satupun.  {nl}Hanya Goddess yang bisa melihat masa depan. Tidak ada orang yang tahu akan takdir mereka, bukan?

Please select the user requiring a quest: Have you not met other Revelators yet?
Apakah kamu sudah bertemu Savior lainnya?

Please select the user requiring a quest: I don't know much about the Dream of goddess or the revelation... {nl}But one thing for sure is that there are a lot of people like you.
Aku tidak tahu banyak tentang mimpi Goddess ataupun wahyunyaâ€¦  {nl}Tapi satu hal yang pasti bahwa ada banyak orang sepertimu.

Please select the user requiring a quest: I named it Spion. {nl}Why I named it that is... Well... Doesn't it sound cool?
Aku memberi nama Spion.  {nl}Kenapa aku memberi nama ituâ€¦ yaaâ€¦ bukankah itu terdengar keren?

Please select the user requiring a quest: That guy who's playing with a furry friend is Pitt, my long time friend. {nl}We've been friends since we were young and emotional. We really wanted to be heroes.
Orang yang bermain bersama teman berbulu ini adalah Pitt, teman lamaku.  {nl}Kami sudah berteman sejak masih kecil dan emosional. Kami ingin sekali menjadi pahlawan.

Please select the user requiring a quest: And while listening to stories about Vacenin, we just entered the army. {nl}But isn't it cool? One day, I will enter Vacenin's troops and be a hero.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Your abilities prove your competence. {nl}If you have something to say, do it with results!

Please select the user requiring a quest: Only the best soldiers are accepted to Vacenin's troops. {nl}It's important to prove that you are the best.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Oh... That's weird. I had it all here a while ago...
Ohâ€¦ Itu cukup aneh. Beberapa saat lalu aku masih punya semuanyaâ€¦

Please select the user requiring a quest: I sell equipment to soldiers who lack supplies. {nl}Can't give them away though. I have a family to feed...
Aku menjual perlengkapan kepada prajurit yang kekurangan suplai.  {nl}Kamu tidak bisa meminta itu secara cuma-cuma. Aku punya keluarga untuk diberi makanâ€¦

Please select the user requiring a quest: I've got some antidotes left. {nl}Take as many as you want.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Sorry I can't be of much help.

Please select the user requiring a quest: I used up all I had a few days ago. {nl}Maybe some other people have it.

Please select the user requiring a quest: My strength will weaken every time I put a part of myself into a revelation.{nl}More than a thousand years will have passed by the time this revelation reaches you, {nl}and even my consciousness will have ceased to exist.

Please select the user requiring a quest: That is why I needed to find a guardian to protect the revelation.{nl}Unfortunately, my sisters and I did not come to an agreement on my revelation, {nl}and I was not able to leave the revelation to most of them.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Only Saule supported my revelation so I left her with this revelation.{nl}And for a very long time, I went on a journey in search of a guardian.
Hanya Saule yang mengikutiku sehingga aku bisa meninggalkan wahyu ini.  {nl}Dan dalam waktu yang sangat panjang, Aku bepergian untuk mencari seorang guardian.

Please select the user requiring a quest: But most of all, I trusted humans.{nl}You must have seen it yourself by now.{nl}Despite going through disasters such as the Tree of Despair, {nl}humans don't lose hope easily.
Tapi yang terpenting, Aku mempercayai manusia.  {nl}Kamu juga harus melihat bahwa  {nl}meskipun terjadi bencana seperti Tree of Despair,  {nl}manusia tetap tidak kehilangan harapan.

Please select the user requiring a quest: The guardian of the next revelation will be one who unites the kingdom. {nl}You can find my next revelation in the deepest part of the Royal Mausoleum where he rests.

His wife said he was off to get firewood. {nl} Well, for a long time he was gone in Klaipeda. {nl}I've heard that you can find a lot of beautiful girls in Klaipeda. {nl}
Tanggal 10 bulan X{nl} - {nl}Raman, yang tinggal di bank yang berada di tepi sungai yang berlawanan dari tempat kami, Pergi keluar. Istrinya berkata ia pergi untuk mencari kayu bakar. {nl} Untuk waktu ya lama ia telah pergi ke Klaipeda. {nl}Aku telah mendengar bahwa kau dapat menemukan wanita-wanita cantik di Klaipeda. {Nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: The 13th of X {nl} - {nl} Today was Goddess Origin Day, but somehow everyone in town had stomach pains, and could not celebrate. Why this happened specifically on this day I do not know. {nl}Well, illnesses will be illnesses. After all that, we had to make potato porridge. {nl}
Tanggal 13 bulan X {nl} - {nl} Hari ini adalah hari memanjatkan permintaan kepada Goddess, tetapi entah kenapa semua orang di kota mengalami sakit perut, dan tidak dapat merayakannya. Entah kenapa ini terjadi secara spesifik di hari ini. {Nl}Hmm, Sakit akan tetap menjadi sakit. Setelah semua itu, kami harus membuat  potato porridge. {Nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: The 14th of X {nl} - {nl} Last night I had an argument with my little sister. {nl}Writing down what you really think isn't that embarrassing. After what happened, {nl}I made a necklace as a present to her, and she came back to me. {nl}Well, I had to give in eventually. Even so, on one morning, she disappeared to somewhere. {nl}
Tanggal 14 bulan X {nl} - {nl} Semalam aku berdebat dengan adik kecilku. {nl}Menuliskan apa yang kau benar pikirkan adalah bukan sesuatu yang memalukan. Setelah apa yang terjadi, {nl}Aku membuat kalung untuk menghadiahkan kepadanya, dan ia kembali kepadaku. {nl}Yah, terkadang aku harus memberikan sesuatu. Walau begitu, dia menghilang entah kemana suatu pagi. {Nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: Ah, just now my neighbor made me some delicious porridge. {nl} In return I made them some warm soup. I can cook too, you know? {nl}Tonight will be another feast so I'm going to make sure to eat and drink plenty.
Ah, sekarang tetangga Aku membuatkan Aku bubur lezat. {nl} imbalannya Aku membuat mereka beberapa sup hangat. Aku bisa memasak juga, kamu tahu? {nl} Malam ini akan menjadi pesta lain jadi Aku akan memastikan untuk makan dan minum banyak.

Please select the user requiring a quest: The 16th of X {nl} - {nl} I got a stomachache drinking soup that I didn't know already went bad. {nl} I double-checked the smell before eating it, but there was no bad odor. {nl}I felt horrible inside so I went to the well for water. Even with the water, I continued to feel horrible. {nl}
Tanggal 16 bulan X {nl} - {nl} Aku mengalami sakit perut akibat meminum sup yang ternyata sudah basi. {Nl} Padahal aku memeriksa dua kali dengan mencium baunya, sebelum memakannya, tetapi tidak ada bau mencurigakan. {Nl}Aku merasa tidak enak di perutku, jadi aku pergi ke sumur untuk mengambil air. Walaupun telah meminum air, perutku tetap terasa tidak enak. {Nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: I've been throwing up a lot lately but it seems to be getting better now. {nl}Tomorrow I'm going to go see Mr. Gordon to get some medicinal herbs. {nl} My little sister still hasn't come back yet. When I go to her room, I find no clothes. Even Mr. Man is getting worried.
Aku sering muntah belakangan ini, tetapi sekarang sudah lebih membaik. {Nl}Besok aku akan menemui Gordon to get some medicinal herbs. {Nl} Adik kecilku masih juga belum kembali. Ketika aku pergi ke kamarnya, tidak ada baju yang tersisa. Bahkan sekarang Man juga menjadi khawatir.

Please select the user requiring a quest: The 17th of X {nl} - {nl} The village was eerily quiet today. {nl}There are no signs of the people who went earlier to get herbs from Mr. Gordon.
The 17th of X {nl} - {nl}Desa hari ini sepi. {nl} Tidak ada tKamu-tKamu dari orang-orang yang pergi lebih awal untuk mendapatkan herbal dari Mr Gordon.

Please select the user requiring a quest: The 23rd of X {nl} - {nl} This might be the last time I get to write in this diary. {nl} Lyliana, you are the only family I have left in this world... {nl} Please be alive somewhere... {nl}
The 23rd of X {nl} - {nl} Ini mungkin menjadi yang terakhir kalinya aku menulis dalam buku harian ini. {nl} Lyliana, Kamu adalah satu-satunya keluarga yang tersisa di dunia ini ... {nl} Tolong bertahan hidup di suatu tempat ... {nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: {nl}(There is something written, but it's all jumbled up and has ceased to be legible.)
{nl}(Ada sesuatu yang tertulis, tapi itu semua campur aduk dan tidak terbaca.)

Please select the user requiring a quest: Unknown Date {nl} - {nl}Several days must've passed. {nl}I've been on the run for around two days now without food or sleep. {nl}The people who fled to Klaipeda were all caught and killed. {nl}I don't even know how many are still alive and can walk. {nl}Everything is as quiet as the shadows, yet moving at a quick pace. We are all tense from fear of attack.
Tanggal tidak diketahui {nl}- {nl}Beberapa hari telah berlalu. {nl}Aku telah berlari kira-kira dua hari lamanya, tanpa makan dan minum. {nl}Orang-orang yang lari ke Klaipeda semua ditangkap dan dibunuh. {nl}Aku bahkan tidak tahu berapa banyak yang masih hidup dan dapat berjalan. {nl}Semua sama tenang seperti bayangan, tetapi bergerak dengan irama yang cepat. Kita semua dibayangi dengan ketakutan akan serangan.

Please select the user requiring a quest: They did not wish for any uproar or disorder. {nl}They are not people. {nl}We must somehow notify Klaipeda. {nl}A last resort would be to abandon everything we can't use and move out.
Mereka tidak berharap keributan atau gangguan. {nl} Mereka bukan orang-orang. {nl} Kita harus memberitahu Klaipeda entah bagaimana caranya. {nl} Yang terakhir akan meninggalkan yang tidak dapat kita gunakan dan berpindah.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Oh. It's you. {nl}This is our army base camp, so feel free to relax.
Oh. Kamu. {Nl}Ini markas tentara kami, jadi silahkan beristirahat.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Have you already met the other soldiers? {nl}Hmm... What's your name?
Apakah Kamu bertemu dengan prajurit lain sudah? {nl} Hmm ... Siapa namamu?

Please select the user requiring a quest: Alright, thanks. You guys are working hard. {nl}I want to talk to my aides. Where are they?
Baiklah, terima kasih. Kalian telah bekerja keras. {nl} Aku ingin berbicara dengan pembantu Aku. Di mana mereka?

Please select the user requiring a quest: Do you have something to say?
Jadi. Ada sesuatu yang ingin kamu katakan.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Send the two from the entrance to the front lines? {nl}Ha, that's nonsense. Did they ask you for that?
Mengirim dua dari pintu masuk ke garis depan? {nl} Ha, itu omong kosong. Apakah mereka meminta Kamu untuk melakukan itu?

Please select the user requiring a quest: It's you? That would bother me. {nl}Hmm... I'm thankful that you are willing to join the front lines even when you can have it easier here...
Itu kamu? Hal itu akan mengganggu Aku. {nl} Hmm ... Aku bersyukur bahwa Kamu bersedia bergabung dengan garis depan bahkan ketika Kamu dapat memiliki lebih mudah di sini

Please select the user requiring a quest: I hate people who lack responsibility. {nl}Are there people who can take over your positions?
Aku benci orang yang tidak bertanggungjawab. {nl}Adakah orang yang dapat menggantikan posisimu?

Please select the user requiring a quest: I like your spirit. {nl}But that doesn't mean I can take you in without question.
Aku suka dengan semngatmu.{nl}Tetapi bukan berarti aku dapat mebgambilmu tanpa pertanyaan.

Please select the user requiring a quest: We are the undefeated unit of Laimondas. {nl}I only accept the best soldiers I can find.
Kami adalah unit tidak terkalahkan dari Laimondas. {nl} Hanya menerima para prajurit terbaik yang dapat Aku temukan.

Please select the user requiring a quest: By the way, are you going to take this guy as well?
Apakah kamu akan mangajak orang ini juga?

Please select the user requiring a quest: I don't know what he does, but please keep this in mind: {nl}War is not a joke. I'll let you take him if you're willing to work with him in battle.
Aku tidak tahu apa yang dia lakukan, tetapi ingatlah ini. peperangan bukanlah lelucon. {nl}aku akan menerima dia jika kamu dapat menggukanan dia dengan baik dalam pertempuran.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Damn, I thought it would die after getting its throat cut. {nl}I hope it can just behave and die slowly now.
Sial, aku menunggu terlalu lama. {nl} Aku harap dia terbunuh secara diam-diam.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Oops. I was late this time. Well, it doesn't matter that much. {nl}Soon my masterpiece will be complete. I hope you guys like it.
Aku terlambat kali ini. Ya, ini tidak terlalu berarti. {nl}Sebentar lagi karyaku akan selesai dan aku harap kalian menyukainya.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Unknown Demon
Iblis yang tidak diketahui

Please select the user requiring a quest: Ah... I almost forgot. I'll be taking this guy along!
Ah.. Aku hampir lupa. Aku akan membawa orang ini bersamaku!

Please select the user requiring a quest: I can feel Laima's power.
Aku bisa merasakan kekuatan Laima

Please select the user requiring a quest: This pain I haven't felt for a long time...
Rasa sakit yang sudah lama tidak kurasakan...{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: Even so, I will not waste my power on you.
Meskipun begitu, Aku tidak akan menyia-nyiakan kekuatanku untuk melawan kalian.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: I guess the real revelation is in the chapel? {nl}That Laima could only prepare this much. Such a pity.
Sepertinya penyelamat yang asli berada di cathedral?{nl}Apakah hanya ini persiapan Laima, sungguh menyedihkan.

Please select the user requiring a quest: This is the Seal of Space...{nl}
Ini adalah Seal of Space .. {nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: We will need the Revelator.
Kita akan membutuhkan Savior.

Please select the user requiring a quest: The Revelator has came here alone. {nl}Exactly what I wanted.
Savior datang ke sini sendiri.{nl}Seperti apa yang aku inginkan.
Untuk apa kalian mengunjungi kota terkutuk ini? {nl}Mohon kembali saja jika kamu tidak mempunyai tujuan khusus.

Please select the user requiring a quest: So you are the famous Revelator. The Knights of Kaliss are looking for competent people like you. {nl}If you're here to help them, I'll temporarily permit your entrance.
Jadi kamu Savior yang terkenal itu. Caliss Knightage sedang mencari orang-orang sepertimu. {nl}Jika kamu akan menolong mereka, aku akan mengijinkanmu masuk sebentar.

Please select the user requiring a quest: But please don't forget. The right to enter here belongs to our soldiers. {nl}We hope you don't create unnecessary trouble.
Kumohon jangan lupa. Untuk memasuki tempat ini hanya diperbolehkan untuk prajurit kami. {nl}kami harap kamu tidak menimbulkan masalah bagi kami.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Salister... What are you even talking about? {nl}That's absurd...
Salister.. Apa yang kamu katakan? {nl}itu konyol..

Please select the user requiring a quest: The Symbol of Silt is in my hands thanks to you. {n}If I pass this symbol to the dumb Royal Army or the Knights of Kaliss, they're going to give me more shifts on watch.
TKamu Schilt ada di tangan Aku terima kasih kepadamu. {n} Jika Aku dapat melewati tentara kerajaan yang bodoh atau Knights of Kaliss dengan tKamu ini, mereka akan lebih mengawasiku.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Only an ambitious and clever man such as I could unleash this object's true potential.
Benda ini akan lebih efektif jika dimiliki oleh orang yang memiliki ambisi dan kepintaran sepertiku.

Please select the user requiring a quest: I will now use the power of Petrification and Ice to awaken this centuries-old power. {nl} Please stay there and observe.
Aku akan mengontrol kekuatan Petrification dan Ice untuk membangunkan kekuatan Ancient yang ada pada ratusan tahun lalu. {nl}Diam disitu dan lihatlah.

Please select the user requiring a quest: I will help keep the Spirits of Time off of you!
Aku akan membantumu agar Spirits of Time tidak menyerangmu!

Please select the user requiring a quest: What's happening? {nl}It's coming this way! Watch out!
Apa yang terjadi? Benda itu datang kesini! {nl}Hati - hati!

Please select the user requiring a quest: Are you headed to the Great Cathedral, Revelator? {nl}Be careful! The demons have surrounded us!
Savior, apakah kamu akan pergi ke cathedral? Hati - hati! {nl}Banyak monster disana!

Please select the user requiring a quest: The barrier is up and running. {nl}Please deal with Gesti while I activate the Divine Sphere.
Barrier bekerja. {nl}saat aku mengaktifkan Lection, tolong urus Gesti.

Please select the user requiring a quest: If she's not on the first floor, then she must be on the second. {nl}I hope we're not too late.
Jika tidak ada di 1st floor, pasti itu ada di 2nd floor. {nl}Aku harap kita tidak belum terlambat. {nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: This is my friend, Donatas. {nl}I will go up first to figure out Gesti's movements, so come up once you're ready.
Dia dipanggil Donatas.  {nl}Aku akan keatas untuk melihat bagaimana pekerjaan Gesti, pergilah keatas jika kamu sudah siap.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Hey! You shouldn't come here!
Hey kamu tidak seharusnya datang kesini!

Please select the user requiring a quest: So the Peltasta Master sent it... Ah, so this is what those cowardly miners were talking about.
Jadi Peltasta Master mengirimkannya ... Ah, jadi ini adalah apa yang para penambang pengecut bicarakan.

Please select the user requiring a quest: No worries at all. I'm not scared. They're all fake rumors. {nl}It's no surprise the mine is shaking.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Vubbes are pouring out of the Crystal Mine. {nl}The Miner's Village needs your help.

Please select the user requiring a quest: A wicked aura has descended upon Silverstream Gorge, signaling an invasion by demons. {nl}Scouts and Paladin followers have been blocking their advance, but desperately need your help.
Sebuah aura jahat telah turun ke atas Silverstream Gorge, menandakan invasi oleh setan. {nl} Pengikut Scouts and Paladin telah memblokir maju, tetapi sangat membutuhkan bantuan Kamu.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Monsters are attacking the Tenet Church. {nl}Paladin followers are blocking their attacks, but they will soon fall without any help.

Please select the user requiring a quest: There's a dark aura forming at Gate Route. {nl}If we don't get rid of that aura, thorny vines will cover the forest.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Please help the historians at Gateway of Great King. {nl}Monsters are chasing them since they've found a clue about Medzio Diena.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Zachariel, the Great King's tomb is being ruined by a horde. {nl}The tomb will be destroyed by the demons if you don't fight them.
Zachariel, makam besar Raja dirusak oleh para gerombolan. {nl} makam tersebut akan hancur oleh iblis jika Kamu tidak melawan mereka.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Monsters are obstructing the entrance at High Crooked Road. {nl}If these monsters are not taken care of, then the cities and villages will be isolated.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Demons have invaded Mage Tower. {nl}We need your help quickly.
Iblis telah menginvasi Mage Tower. {nl} Kami membutuhkan bantuan Kamu secepatnya.

Please select the user requiring a quest: This is an old story of Fedimian before the Goddess Statue was built.
Ini adalah cerita lama Fedimian sebelum Statue of Goddess.

Please select the user requiring a quest: A long time ago, the people of Fedimian were quite normal, {nl}not much different from the ordinary people of the rest of the world. {nl}However, the people of Fedimian did differ from their worldly peers in one aspect.
Dahulu orang - orang Fedimian adalah orang biasa dan tidak berbeda dengan orang - orang lainnya yang ada di dunia. {nl}bahkan orang - orang tua Fedimian di satu sisi berbeda dengan orang - orang dari tempat lain.

Please select the user requiring a quest: The people of Fedimian were very cautious.{nl}In the sense that they take the word 'cautious' much more seriously. {nl}These people were as cautious around fire as they were without.
Orang - orang Fedimian selalu waspada. {nl} Orang-orang Fedimian sangat menjaga kata - kata mereka, mereka tidak ingin menimbulkan salah paham dari perkataan mereka.

Please select the user requiring a quest: The Fedimians were modest about this with others. {nl}Even those who stayed at Fedimian for a while could not pick up the trait.
Orang - orang Fedemian rendah hati kepada orang lain. {nl}Bahkan orang yang tinggal sebentar di Fedemian tidak dapat menirukan sifat mereka.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Thanks to this behavior, the people of Fedimian fared better during tough times, {nl}as they were able to sense danger coming.
Terima kasih atas perlakuan ini, orang - orang Fedemian dapat melihat lebih baik terhadap suatu masalah karena mereka seperti dapat melihat masalah yang akan datang.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Because of this, no few words were said about the cautiousness of the Fedimian people.
Karena hal ini, tidak diragukan lagi kewaspadaan dari orang - orang Fedemian.

Please select the user requiring a quest: In Fedimian, if someone dropped money on the ground, it would be gone forever. {nl}In a world where money mostly consists of silver coins, {nl}only the creditors would know exactly how much money has been lost in this manner.
Di Fedemian, jika seseorang menjatuhkan uang, maka uang itu akan hilang. Di dunia ini yang kebanyakan uang adalah Silver maka hanya yang membawa uang tersebut lah yang mengetahui jumlah pasti uang tersebut.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Why money disappears into the ground at Fedimian remains unknown. {nl}Some people believe the Goddess Zemyna absorbs any money that makes contact with her area. {nl}Most commoners, however, believe this was done to reduce the demand of silver coins from creditors.
Mengapa uang hilang jika terjatuh di Fedemian masih merupakan misteri. {nl}Beberapa orang percaya bahwa Goddess Zemyna yang mengambil uang tersebut. {nl}Tetapi banyak orang yang percaya hal ini untuk mengurangi pinjaman silver dari kreditor.

Please select the user requiring a quest: By believing that the goddess herself takes the silver,{nl}the people found it pointless to try and dig it up in her grounds. {nl}The fact that you can offer silver coins at Fedimian as tribute to her reinforces this idea.
Dengan percaya bahwa Goddes yang mengambil silver tersebut, orang - orang merasa tidak akan ada gunanya jika mencoba manggali tanah tersebut untuk mendapatkan silver. {nl}Bukti bahwa kamu dapat menawarkan silver tersebut sebagai persembahan di Fedemian memperkuat hal ini.

Please select the user requiring a quest: In any case, the fact that one could lose money by dropping it on Fedimian soil {nl}has made Fedimians very careful in handling their money.
Jadi, karena uang yang akan hilang jika terjatuh di tanah Fedemian telah membuat otang - orang Fedemian sangat hati - hati dalam memegang uang mereka.

Please select the user requiring a quest: However, as much as one tries to be careful, mistakes still happen. {nl}More so with the case of young girls. {nl}One day, it happened to a girl named Aiste.
Tetapi, walaupun sudah berhati -hati, kesalahan tetap terjadi. {nl}Hal ini lebih banyak terjadi pada para gadis. {nl}suatu hari hal ini terjadi pada gadis bernama Aiste.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Normally, when one drops silver coins on the ground, it would scatter about on the road, {nl}and then disappear without a trace. {nl}{nl}Fedimians usually curse their own carelessness and move on, {nl}but Aiste was different: she wondered why and how it happened.
Biasanya, saat silver jatuh ke tanah, silver tersebut akan masuk ke dalam tanah dan menghilang tanpa jejak. {nl}orang - orang Fedemian akan menyesali kesalahan mereka sendiri karena menjatuhkan silver tersebut dan merelakannya. Tetapi berbeda dengan Aiste, dia penasaran mengapa hal ini bisa terjadi.

Please select the user requiring a quest: To find out what happened, Aiste began inspecting the area she lost her coins at. {nl}In her search she came across a beggar beside the deep end of the canal.

{nl}{nl}Di dalam kota Klaipeda, pernah ada seseorang yang tinggal dengan nama Modestas. {nl}Dia adalah orang yang baik, jujur - tapi memiliki satu kelemahan utama bahwa teman-temannya dan keluarganya khawatir, terutama istrinya. {nl}Modestas tidak malas atau sangat rajin atau terlalu bodoh. {nl}Dia tidak minum atau berkelahi. {nl}Pria ini memiliki satu cacat, dan itu yang ia cintai untuk berjudi.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: During the day, Modestas would work hard and would never let himself go hungry - {nl}but whenever he earned more than he really needed, he would gamble. {nl}The wife would always try to save this money, but not one extra coin would ever go toward their home.
Pada siang hari, Modestas akan bekerja keras dan tak akan membiarkan dirinya sendiri sampai kelaparan - {nl}tetapi kapanpun ketika ia mendapatkan uang lebih dari yang ia butuhkan, Ia akan berjudi. {nl}Istrinya selalu mencoba untuk menyelamatkan uangnya, tetapi tidak ada koin yang tersisa yang pernah sampai di rumah mereka.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Whenever she could, Modestas' wife would often go to the shrine, and pray to the goddess' likeness. {nl}But Modestas continued his odd habits, and the people around him grew increasingly concerned. {nl}After all, the mind of a gambler would think, 'Today it may be small, but tomorrow it could be big!' {nl}And so the days rolled by, same as they ever were, until one peculiar day.

Please select the user requiring a quest: This old woman seemed not only old and frail, but had an unnerving aura around her. {nl}She was acting strangely, as if deep in thought or as if she was obsessed with whatever she was doing. {nl}Modestas thought about simply ignoring the woman and walking past.
