Please select the user requiring a quest: Because Modestas had no ropes or equipment to secure the boulder onto the wagon, he had to lean the wagon and carefully drive it to Klaipeda. {nl}On his way to Klaipeda, he again met the soldiers who he had earlier bet against. Their commanding officer was now aware of what had happened thus far, and wanted to apologize to Modestas for getting him caught up and hurt in his subordinates' affairs. {nl}
Karena Modestas tidak memiliki tali atau perlengkapan untuk mengamankan batu ke gerobak, ia harus bersandar pada gerobak dan berhati-hati mengendarainya sampai ke Klaipeda. {nl} Dalam perjalanannya menuju ke Klaipeda, Ia bertemu lagi dengan para pasukan yang sebelumnya bertaruh melawannya. Petugas pemimpin mereka sekarang lebih awas atas hal yang telah terjadi sejauh ini, dan ingin meminta maaf kepada Modestas, karena telah membuatnya terjebak dan terluka oleh permainan pengikutnya. {nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: The officer returned Modesta's gold to him, and ordered his soldiers to help him transport the boulder back to Klaipeda. {nl}
Petugas mengembalikan Emas Modestas kepadanya, dan memerintahkan prajuritnya untuk membantu dia mengangkut kembali ke Klaipeda. {nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: The officer and solders had sturdy rope, so they were able to transport the rock without worry of it falling off and unload it at Klaipeda. They decided to accompany Modestas all the way there. {nl}Modestas was very grateful for the help. {nl} Along with the soldiers, Modestas again ran into none other than the Alchemist he had lost earlier against.
Officer dan prajurit, dengan batu yang bergoyang dan tali yang kuat, setelah dikelilingi oleh wagon agar tidak jatuh, keluar untuk memberikan bantuan pada kota, jadi memungkinkan membuat batu pada Klaipeda.  {nl} Modestass Mr. berterimakasih atas bantuan prajurit.  {nl} Modestass Mr. dan prajurit bertemui para Alchemist sebagai musuh mereka.

Please select the user requiring a quest: To Modestas, a promise was a promise, so he immediately handed over the gold the soldiers returned to him to the Alchemist. {nl}The Alchemist, surprised by how Modestas could do this with no complaints or dissatisfaction, took the gold and conversed with him.
Untuk Modestas, janji adalah janji, sehingga ia bergegas untuk menyerahkan emas kepada para pasukan untuk dikembalikan kepada Alchemist. {nl} Alchemist terkejut bagaimana Modestas bisa melakukan ini tanpa komplain dan rasa tidak puas, ia mengambil emas dan berbincang dengannya.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Not wanting to be left out of the conversation between Modestas and the Alchemist, the soldiers couldn't continue working, joined in, and learned about the Alchemist's past with Modestas. {nl}The Alchemist apologized to Modestas for turning his lead into gold, and promised to gather all the support he could for Modestas at Klaipeda. He then left. {nl}
Tidak ingin tertinggal dari pembicaraan antara Modestas dan Alchemist, Para pasukan tidak dapat melanjutkan bekerja, dan mereka bergabung juga, lalu mempelajari tentang masa lalu dari Alchemist dengan Modestas. {nl} Alchemist meminta maaf kepada Modestas karena mengubah tembaga miliknya menjadi emas, dan berjanji untuk mengumpulkan seluruh dukungan untuk Modestas di Klaipeda. Lalu ia pun pergi. {nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: Soon after, Modestas and the soldiers reached Klaipeda. They set the stone down at the large open space at the center of town. {nl}
Segera setelah itu, Modestas dan para pasukan mencapai Klaipeda. Mereka meletakkan batu di bawah pada ruang terbuka besar di tengah kota. {nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: When the boulder was set in its proper place with the help of the soldiers, the Alchemist who had left returned with another person. The Alchemist had brought with him a famous Dievdirbys.{nl}To the Dievdirbys, the Alchemist suggested, {nl}'Why don't you sculpt a statue of a goddess using this boulder, on this central site of Klaipeda? If this boulder is changed into a statue of a goddess, then nobody in Klaipeda will be able to deny its significance. I think that will fulfill your promise to the old woman.'{nl}
Dan Alchemist setelah batunya tersingkir mebawa satu orang, yaitu sculptor terkenal Dievdirby.  {nl} Dievdirby berkata.  {nl} "ini adalah inti dari Klaipeda, orang di Klaipeda tidak mendapatkan gambarannya? Batu ini telah berubah menjadi sosok Goddess , aku rasa kalian harus mengakui nilainya. Jadi syarat yang diangkat oleh old lady dan Ne kita anggap telah disetujui."  {nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: Everyone who was there favored the idea on the spot. {nl}The Alchemist took the gold he obtained from Modestas and paid it to the Dievdirbys as commission, and went to get permission from the Knight Commander and Bishop of Klaipeda.{nl}
Semua orang yang ada disana, berada di menyukai ide akan tempat itu.{nl} Alchemist mengambil Emas yang ia terima dari Modestas dan membayarkannya kepada Dievdirbys sebagai komisi, dan ia pergi untuk mendapatkan ijin dari Knight Leader dan Bishop Klaipeda.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: As news spread, everyone in Klaipeda was pleased to know a Goddess Statue was planned for their city. {nl}However, one last problem remained, asides from winning their favor. And that question was, which goddess should the statue commemorate? {nl}The soldiers who gave help transporting the boulder were especially passionate about this issue, and began quarrelling again. {nl}
Berarti setelah ini, aku senang telah membuat semua patung di Klaipeda.  {nl} Hanya ada satu masalah tersisa yakni mendapatkan berkat yang lain. Menjadi pertanyaan apakah membuat patungnya sebagai perayaan.  {nl} Terutama para prajurit yang telah membanti membawa batu ini, juga ada tempat untuk berbeda pendapat dan bertarung lagi.  {nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: The one who answered this question was none other than Modestas. {nl}Without any real intent, Modestas argued that the goddesses in power have guided him via divine providence to build a statue at Klaipeda that day. {nl}
Seseorang yang menjawab pertanyaan ini adalah tidak lain tetapi adalah Modestas. {nl} Tanpa intensi serius, Modestas berargumen bahwa Goddess dengan kekuatannya, telah mengarahkan dia untuk membangun patung di Klaipeda pada hari itu. {nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: #VALUE!
Bet yang cukup berani muncul di old form, dengan menggerakan mountain menjadi bukti bahwa ini dipersembahkan untuk para Goddess  agar menjelaskan faktanya kepada orang-orang.  {nl} Lalu, orang-orang setuju untuk mengikuti perkataan Modestass, Modestas's diperbolehkan untuk menyelesaikan gambar lewat Dievdirby.  {nl} Akhirnya ketika gambar selesai, warga Klaipeda memiliki Perfect Dano, gambar yang mereka hormati sebagai Statue of Goddess, yang dibuat di jantuh kota.  {nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: However, to their bewilderment, not a single soul could recognize the goddess whom the completed statue commemorated.{nl}
Bagaimanapun diantara kebingungan, tidak ada satu orang Klaipeda pun yang dapat mengenali patung Goddess yang telah selesai dibuat.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: The Dievdirbys who had sculpted the statue had already vanished deep into the Kateen Forest, so the citizens of Klaipeda repeatedly questioned Modestas for her name. {nl}Despite the numerous questions, nobody received an answer from Modestas. {nl}At any rate, this is the story of how the Goddess Statue of Klaipeda came to be. Even now that statue stands in the center of Klaipeda.{nl}
Dievdirby memahat patungnya, tidak mampu mengetahui dimana keberadaannya dan menghilang di tengah hutan Katyn, warga Klaipeda langsung bertanya pada Modestass.  {nl} Namun, tidak ada seorangpun yang mendapatkan jawaban dari Modestass.  {nl} ini adalah cerita Built Statue of Klaipeda. Patungnya telah diletakkan di tengah kota Klaipeda hingga kini.  {nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: And so, some people believed Modestas, having undertaken the goddesses' intervention, was an honest man who did not gamble. In reality, Modestas didn't stop making gambles until his death. {nl}
Dan beberapa orang bahwa Modestas, Telah mengalami Intervesi dari Para Goddess, ia adalah sungguh orang yang jujur dan tidak melakukan judi. Kenyataannya, Modestas tidak berhenti berjudi sampai ia meninggal. {nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: Ever since then, whenever Modestas took on a wager, he always bet the same thing: the answer to the question of who the Statue of Klaipeda honored.{nl}To uncover the name of the goddess, numerous people challenged Modestas to a bet.{nl} {nl}But no matter the impossible odds, Modestas never lost a bet. Nobody was able to win the answer from Modestas for years, and time flew by.{nl}
Namun Modestas adalah jawaban dari pertanyaan tentang apakah patung seperti itu bisa dikenakan bet.  {nl} dan banyak orang mencoba Modestass untuk mendapatkan jawaban atas pertanyaannya.  {nl} Namun, Modestass Mr. tidak memilikinya dan menghilangkan bet dalam kondisi yang terlihat tidak mungkin. Maka, orang-orang terapung dalam kebingungan untuk memecahkan pertanyaan gambar dari model's Stars.  {nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: Though Modestas died an undefeated, invincible gambler, he had never bet anything other than the goddess' identity, living purely off the profits gained from such bets through the end of his life. {nl}
Walaupun Modestas meninggal, ia adalah penjudi yang tak pernah terkalahkan, saat itu ia tidak pernah bertaruh apapun selain akan rahasia Goddess, Ia hidup hanya dari keuntungan yang ia dapat dari bertaruh sampai akhir hayatnya. {nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: In the end, this unknown goddess, in exchange for giving a livelihood to a certain gambler from Klaipeda, created an interesting, mysterious, yet beautiful statue for the city of Klaipeda, and a tale to last for times to come.{nl}{nl}
Sebenarnya tidak diketahui apakh Goddess  diletakan di suatu tempat. Pertanyaan yang menarik tentang patung yang indah untuk dinikmati dalam hidup di betting shop Klaipeda di tengah Klaipeda.  {nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: Someone, somewhere, is gulping down food while I don't even have money to feed my family...
Seseorang pasti sedang sangat kenyang ketika aku bahkan tidak punya uang untuk menafkahi keluargakuâ€¦

Please select the user requiring a quest: You and I are both poor. We can't think of anything else while we're starving.
Kamu dan aku miskin. Apa yang bisa kita bayangkan ketika kita kelaparan.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Okay. I'll sign it so you'll stop bugging me.
Ok. Aku akan menandatanganinya kemudian berhenti menggangguku.

Please select the user requiring a quest: I'm dizzy. Come back later.
Aku pusing. Datang lagi lain nanti.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Can we finally get to sleep in peace? If so, I'll gladly sign that!
Bisakah kita akhirnya tidur dengan damai? Jika ya, aku akan sangat senang menandatangani itu!

Please select the user requiring a quest: I believe things will soon get better.
Aku percaya ini akan menjadi lebih baik

Please select the user requiring a quest: I just signed...
Aku baru saja menandatanganiâ€¦

Please select the user requiring a quest: Hauberk's Introduction
Perkenalan Hauberk

Please select the user requiring a quest: Demons kidnapped by Vakarine and those kicked out of the demonic world have gathered here. {nl}It's a place where vicious criminals are constantly preying on us.
Setan diculik oleh Vakarine dan mereka yang ditendang dari dunia setan sekarang berkumpul di sini.  {nl}Ini adalah tempat dimana penjahat ganas selalu berdoa di kehidupan kita.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Ready? Another group will be coming soon.
Apakah kamu sudah siap? Grup lain akan datang segera ke sini.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Demon Lord Hauberk
Demon Monarch Hauberk

Please select the user requiring a quest: You must have a lot of questions. Ask, Revelator...
Kamu pasti mempunyai banyak pertanyaan untukku. Apa pertanyaanmu? Savior..

Please select the user requiring a quest: Vakarine is fighting Valtrus in the Demon Prison across the portal. {nl}She won't be able hold it for much longer unless someone helps.
Vakarine sedang melawan Valtrus di penjara setan di portal seberang. {nl} Dia tidak akan bertahan lama kecuali seseorang membantunya.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Men under the command of the Baron have been here, though they weren't able to make it back. {nl}I watched everything with the wizard's eyes. {nl}Even the screams of Vakarine and her Kupoles.
Pria-pria dibawah komando Baron telah datang ke sana. Meskipun mereka tidak pernah datang kembali. {nl}Aku telah melihat semuanya ketika berada di dalam wizard.  {nl}Bahkan teriakan Vakarine and pasangannya.

Please select the user requiring a quest: That depends on whether or not you have the will to save the goddess. {nl}We can take time to talk about it.
Sekarang mari bicarakan hal itu. Apakah Kamu bersedia untuk menyelamatkan Goddess atau tidak.

Please select the user requiring a quest: The limbs of Nuaele were all cut off. {nl}Now go find Aldona. {nl}She will take you and Hauberk to Nuaele's territory.
Bagian tubuh Nuaele semua terpotong. {nl} Sekarang carilah Aldona. {nl} Dia akan membawa Kamu dan Hauberk ke wilayah Nuaele.

Please select the user requiring a quest: We will be entering Nuaele's territory now. {nl}Prepare yourself.
Sekarang kita pergi ke area Nuaelle. {nl}Bersiaplah.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Once Nuaele is gone, we'll be able to fight the demons easily- even with only the Kupoles.
Ketika Nuaelles telah pergi, kita dapat melawan setan secara mudah hanya dengan pasangan.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Our biggest problem aside from the corruption breach was Nuaele. {nl}Now we can focus on the former. {nl}Go to Prison District 3. The goddess awaits your support.
Masalah terbesar kita selain dari celah yang terkontaminasi adalah Nuaelle. {nl} Sekarang kita bisa fokus pada celah yang terkontaminasi. {nl} Pergi ke Penjara Distrik 3. Goddess sedang menunggu bantuanmu.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Keep your guard up. {nl}This may be the secret to the last key, but the demons are still watching.
Tetaplah waspada.  {nl}Ini adalah rahasia menuju kunci terakhir tetapi setan sedang mengawasimu.

Please select the user requiring a quest: You will enter a special room once you get all five keys of Maven. {nl}In there, you will be tested to see if you're eligible for the revelation.
Kamu akan masuk ke ruang khusus ketika kamu mendapatkan 5 kunci mayvern. {nl}Di sana, kamu akan diuji untuk melihat jika kamu memenuhi syarat untuk menjadi Savior.

Please select the user requiring a quest: The number of candles is important. But for this secret, you must remember the order of the candles as well. {nl}It is similar to the first secret.
Jumlah lilin adalah penting tetapi untuk rahasia ini, kamu harus mengingat urutan rahasia itu juga.  {nl}Ini miri dengan rahasia pertama.

Please select the user requiring a quest: The device is operating.
Alat telah bekerja

Please select the user requiring a quest: A few manic farmers assaulted the people.
Beberapa petani yang kecanduan menyerang orang-orang.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Guards are working hard to protect the farm. {nl}Help them.
Penjaga bekerja keras menjaga pertanian. {nl}Tolong mereka.

Please select the user requiring a quest: I thank you again in the name of fate. {nl}From here on, I will follow the stars to find Goddess Ausrine.
Aku berterimakasih padamu lagi dalam nasib. {nl}Dari sini, aku akan mengikuti bintang-bintang untuk menemukan Goddess Ausrine.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: Thanks to you, the seal of Uskis Arable Land is now stable. {nl}However, many other Revelators have lost their consciousness to the evil energy at the Spring Light Woods.
Terima kasih kepada Kamu, segel Uskis Arable Land sekarang stabil. {nl} Namun, banyak Savior lainnya yang kehilangan kesadaran oleh energi jahat di Spring Light Woods.

Please select the user requiring a quest: This most glorious Great Cathedral was built 660 years ago under the guide of Archbishop Silvestro Maven.
Gereja ini dibangun 660 tahun yang lalu.  {nl}Dibangun sebagai gereja paling mulia di bawah naungan Uskup Agung Silvestro Maven. {nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: I can still hear it. {nl}The priests' prayers filling the kingdom. {nl}The endless march of pilgrims coming for the grace of the goddess.
Itu seperti aku masih bisa mendengarnya. {nl}Doa-doa para pendeta memenuhi kerajaan.  {nl}Iringan peziarah datang demiberkat para Goddess. {nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: It was like that until four years ago. {nl}Before the curse surrounded the Great Cathedral on Medzio Diena...
Itu seperti itu sampai empat tahun lalu. {nl}Sebelum kutukan mengepung gereja pada Divine day..

Please select the user requiring a quest: Candlestick
Batang lilin

Please select the user requiring a quest: No candlesticks are lit.
Tidak ada batang lilin yang menyala.

Please select the user requiring a quest: I buried Dallas. {nl}His death pains me so much.
Aku menguburkan Dallas. {nl}Itu sangat menyakitkan.

Please select the user requiring a quest: More monsters! Run!
Monster lagi.. Lari!

Please select the user requiring a quest: You were running so hard for me. {nl}Why don't you give me the key, kid?
Kamu telah berlari sangat kencang untukku. {nl}Sekarang mengapa kamu tidak memberikan kunci itu padaku, nak?

Please select the user requiring a quest: The breach of corruption, once open, will continue to expand. {nl}Revelator, please help Vakarine as soon as possible.
Sekali celah yang terkontaminasi terbuka makan akan membesar. {nl}Savior, bantu Vakarine secepatnya.

Please select the user requiring a quest: There seems to be some reaction in the platform of benevolence.
Nampaknya ada suatu reaksi di platform of benevolence.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Bishop Ilam
Bishop Ilam

Please select the user requiring a quest: Bishop Aurelius, who was ordained at a young age, soon took ill and lost his life.
Bishop Aurelius, yang ditahbiskan di usia muda segera menjadi sakit dan kehilangan nyawanya. {nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: His last request was for the Divine Mission for Maven to be fulfilled even after his death and the Church accepted.
Keinginan terakhirnya adalah meminta terpenuhinya misi Divine untuk Mayvern bahkan di kematiannya dan gereja menerima permintaannya.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Nature of the Curse
Kutukan alam.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Gluttony, Wrath, Sloth...{nl}The nature of all curses that affect{nl}mankind is obsession.{nl}It makes the spirits of the dead prefer staying behind as opposed to going to the goddess.
Gluttony, Wrath, Sloth, etc. {nl}Segala kutukan yang mempengaruhi umat manusia adalah obsesi. {nl} Ini seperti semangat orang mati yang tertinggal dan tidak akan datang ke Goddess.

Please select the user requiring a quest: The difference is that it is the will of the dead that keeps the spirit behind {nl}while curses are forced upon by others onto you.
Perbedaannya adalah keinginan orang mati yang menjaga jiwa {nl}sementara kutukan dari orang lain akan melawan kepadamu. {nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: Naturally, priests learning the teachings of the goddess are not permitted to use it unless it's for experiments.
Oleh karena itu, jika kamu adalah pendeta yang mempelajari ajaran Goddess, kamu tidak diijinkan menggunakannya ke orang lain kecuali untuk percobaan.

Please select the user requiring a quest: My Mission 1
Misiku 1

Please select the user requiring a quest: Even if the Revelator gets the revelation in his hands, {nl}it's useless if it can't be protected.
Meskipun Savior mendapatkan penerangan di tangannya, {nl}itu sia-sia jika kamu tidak dapat menjaganya.

Please select the user requiring a quest: The purpose of my secret is not only to protect the revelation from evil but also to prevent the greed of weak Revelators.
Tujuan rahasiaku tidak hanya untuk melindungi Savior dari kejahatan tetapi juga untuk mencegah keserakahan Savior yang lemah.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: May you wander in the everlasting fog of the unknown if you recklessly approach without realizing my intentions.
Mungkin Kamu berjalan dalam kabut abadi yang tidak diketahui jika Kamu sembarangan mendekat tanpa menyadari niat Aku.

Please select the user requiring a quest: My Mission 2
Misiku 2

Please select the user requiring a quest: Those who challenge the Holy Mission won't just try to gently unravel the secret. {nl}Because of that, I had to plan many secrets and take measures against such barbaric actions.
Mereka yang menantang Misi Kudus tidak akan hanya mencoba untuk mengungkap rahasia secara lembut. {nl} Karena itu, Aku harus merencanakan banyak rahasia dan mengambil tindakan terhadap tindakan barbar tersebut.

Please select the user requiring a quest: To obey my secret. {nl}That is the only way to earn the legacy of the goddess.
Untuk mematuhi rahasia Aku. {nl} Itulah satu-satunya cara untuk mendapatkan warisan dari Goddess.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Sign Commemorating the Completion of the Great Cathedral
Memperingati Penyelesaian Katedral

Please select the user requiring a quest: The goddess of this land will build a church. {nl}The forces of evil can never invade this sanctuary. {nl} - Est. Year 434, Silvestro Maven
Goddess negeri ini akan membangun sebuah gereja. {nl} Kekuatan jahat tidak pernah dapat menyerang tempat kudus ini. {nl} - Est. Tahun 434, Silvestro Maven

Please select the user requiring a quest: Memo Someone Left Behind
Seseorang tertinggal di belakang

Please select the user requiring a quest: The highest steeple of the church also fell on Medzio Diena. {nl}The grief and sorrow of the evacuation march was indescribable.
Menara tertinggi gereja jatuh pada Medzio Diena. {nl} Kesedihan dan dukacita rombongan evakuasi tak terlukiskan.

Please select the user requiring a quest: On the day we prayed to the goddess that we would return, everyone cried tears of outrage. {nl}Our church will never succumb to the evil curse.
Pada hari kami berdoa kepada Goddess bahwa kami akan kembali, semua orang menangis air mata kemarahan. {nl} gereja kami tidak akan pernah menyerah pada kutukan jahat.

Please select the user requiring a quest: (There are many books left on the shelf. Which one shall we read?)
Banyak buku di rak. Manakah yang akan kita baca?

Please select the user requiring a quest: Dusty Book
Buku berdebu

Please select the user requiring a quest: (There is a dusty book with a memo on the chair. Which one shall we read?)
(Terdapat buku berdebu dengan catatan di kursi. Manakah yang akan kita baca?)

Please select the user requiring a quest: It was really dangerous a while ago. {nl}If you were any later, we would never have seen the third key.
Itu sangat berbahaya beberapa saat lalu. {nl} Jika Kamu terlambat, kita tidak akan pernah melihat kunci ketiga.

Please select the user requiring a quest: If you use the symbol of spirits, you can see the area where spirits will be absorbed. {nl}Defeat the demons there and their evil force will be absorbed into the symbol.
Jika Kamu menggunakan simbol roh, Kamu dapat melihat daerah di mana roh akan diserap. {nl} Kalahkan setan di sana dan kekuatan jahat mereka akan diserap ke dalam simbol.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Once the Symbol of Spiritual Power is charged, go to Veinika Altar. {nl}Insert the symbol in the Veinika altar and you will receive the third key of Maven.
Setelah Simbol Kekuatan Spiritual terisi, pergi ke Veinika Altar. {nl} Masukkan simbol di altar Veinika dan Kamu akan menerima kunci ketiga Maven.

Please select the user requiring a quest: The medicine should work.
Obat-obatan akan bekerja

Please select the user requiring a quest: The key is at Gaule Altar. {nl}I think you should leak that much information to Naktis' servants.
Kuncinya adalah di Gaule Altar. {nl} Aku pikir Kamu harus membocorkan banyak informasi kepada pengikut Naktis.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Of course, you'll need to use the transformation scroll before doing so.
Tentu saja, Kamu harus menggunakan scroll transformasi sebelum melakukannya.

Please select the user requiring a quest: The secret supposedly unveils upon application of a holy force, {nl}but the trap will activate regardless if it detects an evil force.
Rahasianya seharusnya menyingkap kekuatan suci, {nl} tapi perangkap akan aktif jika mendeteksi kekuatan jahat.

Please select the user requiring a quest: The plan is to get the key after exhausting that trap using Naktis' servants.
Rencananya adalah mendapatkan kunci setelah menggunakan jebakan itu ke pengikut Naktis

Please select the user requiring a quest: Naktis' servants will be punished for prying on Maven's secret. {nl}Use that opportunity to get the key.
pengikut Naktis akan dihukum karena berdoa untuk rahasia Maven. {nl} Gunakan kesempatan itu untuk mendapatkan kunci.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Even if the goddess condemns me for this... I will hold my head high,{nl} because it was for the protection of the revelation.
Bahkan jika Goddess mengutuk Aku untuk ini ... Aku akan tetap teguh, {nl} karena itu untuk perlindungan Savior.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Did you find the last key?
Apakah kamu menemukan kunci terakhir?

Please select the user requiring a quest: This sanctuary is a treasure house of knowledge. {nl}You need to master the fundamentals of everything to protect the kingdom,{nl}and the revelation in the name of the goddess.
Tempat kudus ini adalah rumah harta karun bagi pengetahuan. {nl} Kamu perlu menguasai segala sesuatunya untuk melindungi kerajaan dan Savior dalam nama Goddess.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Studying the demons is no exception.
Mempelajari setan tanpa terkecuali.

Please select the user requiring a quest: The monarch of curses, Naktis... {nl}She has not shown herself yet, but I'm sure she's somewhere inside the sanctuary.
The Monarch of Curses, Naktisâ€¦ {nl}He has not shown himself yet but I'm sure he's somewhere inside the sanctuary.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Perhaps she's waiting for us to get all the keys.
Mungkin dia menunggu kita untuk mendapatkan semua kunci.

Please select the user requiring a quest: I am honored to be able to now guide you to the hidden room.
Aku merasa terhormat dapat membimbingmu sampai ke ruang rahasia.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Focus on the colors of the orbs. {nl}You should insert the key in orbs of the same color.
Fokus kepada warna dari orb. {nl}Kamu harus memasukkan kunci ke dalam orb yang berwarna sama.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Of course it is impossible to press down both footrests alone. {nl}You can use the wood chunks the demons scattered around... or ask colleagues for help.
Tentu saja ini tidak mungkin untuk menekan kedua pijakan bersamaan seorang diri. {nl}Kamu bisa menggunakan potongan kayu yang disebarkan oleh demonâ€¦..atau kamu dapat meminta bantuan seorang rekan.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Coincidentally, I heard an eyewitness account from a refugee from this area. {nl}He asked for the safety of his family when I was being sent here... {nl}But I can't see any member of the Greene family, just refugees and monsters.
Kebetulan, aku mendengar kesaksian dari penduduk daerah sini. {nl} Dia meminta perlindungan untuk keluarganya ketika aku dikirim kesini...{nl}Tetapi aku tidak melihat anggota dari keluarga Greene,hanya penduduk dan monster-monster.

Please select the user requiring a quest: And I found this mysterious seedling. {nl}Unlike others, we can feel a mysterious force from these. {nl}I can't identify this force in detail... {nl}But I'm sure it can purify evil.
Dan aku menemukan bibit misterius ini. {nl}Tidak seperti yang lain,kita dapat merasakan kekuatan misterius dari benda ini. {nl}Aku tidak dapat mengenali dengan detail kekuatan ini. {nl}Tetapi aku yakin ini bisa memurnikan kekuatan jahat.

Please select the user requiring a quest: We would have known better if Master was here. {nl}At any rate, we have to test if this seedling actually has the power to purify. {nl}I will do a simple purifying ritual. {nl}Get me some Ellom Leaves to grasp the pollution status of this area.
Kita akan memiliki pengetahuan lebih jika Master disini. {nl}Pokoknya, kita harus memeriksa apakah bibit ini sebenarnya punya kekuatan untuk memurnikan.  {nl}Aku akan melakukan ritual pemurnian sederhana {nl}Bawakan aku beberapa Ellom Leaves untuk memahami status polusi di area ini.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Now, let's start. {nl}Please watch together.
Sekarang, mari kita mulai. {nl}Tolong lihat bersama-sama.

Please select the user requiring a quest: But he is a druid who has accomplished as much as I have. {nl}I think he can find out what the secret of this seedling is.
Tapi dia adalah druid yang telah menyelesaikan sebanyak yang aku miliki. {nl}Aku pikir dia bisa menemukan apa rahasia dari bibit ini.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Also, you may experience something unusual if you have this twig. {nl}If you do, please tell him about it too.
Dan juga, kamu mungkin mengalami sesuatu yang tidak biasa jika kamu memiliki ranting ini. {nl}Jika kamu mengalaminya, tolong beritahu dia juga tentang hal ini.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Please find my colleague in Shaton Farm.
Tolong temukan rekanku di Shaton Farm.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Aren't the dandelions around pretty? {nl}They disservice me, however, by sucking nutrients from the ground. {nl}If this continues, we won't be having a wheat harvest next season. {nl}Please remove the dandelions from the farm.
Tidakkah dandelion disekitar sini cantik?{nl}Mereka membuatku rugi, bagaimanapun, dengan menyerap nutrisi dari tanah. {nl}Jika ini terus berlanjut, kita tidak akan bisa panen gandum musim depan.{nl}Tolong singkirkan dandelion dari ladang ku.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Huh?
Huh?

Please select the user requiring a quest: Huh?
Huh?

Please select the user requiring a quest: Huh?
Huh?

Please select the user requiring a quest: Falconer
Huh?

Please select the user requiring a quest: We're fighting hard. {nl}My mens' injuries are far more urgent than the farmers, wouldn't you agree? {nl}But some druid provided medicine only to the farmers which they then hid away. {nl}I have no words...
Kita bertarung dengan susah payah.{nl}Cidera pasukanku lebih penting dibandingkan para petani, apa kau setuju?{nl}Tetapi beberapa druid menyediakan obat hanya untuk para petani,yang setelahnya mereka sembunyikan. {nl}Aku tidak bisa berkata apa-apa...

Please select the user requiring a quest: It's simple. I will look out for my men first. {nl}Bring me the medicine that they've hidden. It shouldn't be hard to find. {nl}Probably in some wooden box or grape wagon, possibly an empty house... Somewhere there.
Ini sederhana, aku akan mencari pasukanku terlebih dahulu.{nl}Bawakan aku obat yang mereka sembunyikan, ini seharusnya tidak terlalu sulit.{nl}Mungkin ada di beberapa kotak kayu atau kereta anggur, bisa juga di rumah kosong... entah dimana diluar sana.

Please select the user requiring a quest: But be careful. {nl}If this bowl fills with water, the spell will fume a special force. {nl}Then the monsters attracted to that force might attack.
Tetapi Hati-hati.{nl}Jika mangkok ini terisi dengan air,mantra akan mengeluarkan kekuatan istimewa.{nl}Lalu para monster yang terkena ledakan istimewa itu mungkin akan menyerang.

Please select the user requiring a quest: It was successful. {nl}Did you know these seeds are the same type as the mysterious seedlings? {nl}Seems like a wide range of land can be purified if it's grown well enough.
Ini berhasil.{nl}Apa kamu tahu bibit-bibit ini sama seperti bibit misterius?{nl}Sepertinya jangkauan area yang lebar dari pulau dapat di murnikan jika ini tumbuh dengan cukup baik.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Growing these will use up parts of the cultivated farm however. {nl}The landlord of the farm in the reservoir area, Shaton, {nl}is here just in time so I should try persuading him while I can.
Bagaimanapun juga,menumbuhkannya akan menggunakan bagian ladang yang telah di budidayakan.{nl}Pemilik ladang di reservoir area,Shaton,akan tiba beberapa saat lagi jadi aku harus membujuknya selagi bisa.

Please select the user requiring a quest: I'll meet you in the reservoir area.
Aku akan menemuimu di reservoir area.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Soldier Mike
Tentara Mike

Please select the user requiring a quest: My parent passed away on Medzio Diena because of them. {nl}I applied as a soldier here for my parents' revenge. {nl}But... it's a shame. I can't even so much as look at them. {nl}Please, do me a favor and kill them for me!
Orangtuaku meninggal di Medzio Diena karena mereka.{nl}Aku melamar menjadi prajurit disini untuk dendam orangtuaku.{nl}Tetapi..ini memalukan.Aku bahkan tidak bisa begitu banyak seperti melihat mereka.{nl}Tolong,kabulkan permintaanku dan bunuh mereka untukku!

Please select the user requiring a quest: They'll jump out when you approach the bush and more'll come out if you shake it. {nl}You're partly responsible for it so you should help.
Mereka akan melompat keluar ketika kamu mencapai semak dan akan muncul lebih banyak lagi jika kamu menggoyangkannya.{nl}Kamu sebagian bertanggung jawab untuk ini, jadi kamu harus membantu.

Please select the user requiring a quest: There was a young couple that used to work here. They were very diligent. {nl}Everyone here did not work hard because they hated Shaton but they were different.
Ada pasangan muda yang bekerja disini. Mereka sangat rajin.{nl}Semuanya disini tidak bekerja keras karena mereka membenci Shaton, tetapi mereka lain.

Please select the user requiring a quest: But that Shaton abused and exploited them. {nl}They ended up dying of overwork. I have some of their keepsakes... {nl}I promised to bury it near the grave but I lost the bag I kept them in in the chaos of Medzio Diena. {nl}If you find an old bag, please check if there's a ring inside.
Tetapi Shaton menyalahgunakan dan memanfaatkan mereka.{nl}Mereka berakhir sekarat karena bekerja berlebihan.Aku punya beberapa kenangan dari mereka...{nl}Aku berjanji untuk menguburnya di dekat kuburan mereka,tetapi aku kehilangan tas yang berisi benda itu di the chaos of Medzio Diena.{nl}Jika kamu menemukan sebuah tas tua, tolong periksa apakah di dalamnya ada cincin.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Good. This potion cost me a fortune at the Fedimian Black Market. {nl}It was from an elementalist who seemed trustworthy, unlike those druids. {nl}According to him, this potion contains the essence of alchemy.
Bagus. Jika dengan obat ini dapat membuatnya berbicara, maka membelinya di Femidian Black Market dengan biaya yang mahal juga tak apa kan.{nl}Berbeda dengan para druid yang terlihat lemah lunglai, Alchemist memiliki tampilan wajah yang lebih terpercaya.{nl}Jika mengikuti perkataannya obat ini adalah obat yang terlarut dari Alchemy Essence.

Please select the user requiring a quest: He said if I pour this on the ground, a powerful obedient monster will appear. {nl}I'll use it to wipe out all the monsters in my farm!
Dia bilang jika aku menuangkan ini di atas tanah,monster patuh yang sangat kuat akan muncul.{nl}Aku akan menggunakan ini untuk membersihkan semua monster di ladang ku!!

Please select the user requiring a quest: Well, I've made some mistakes here and there but who doesn't? {nl}I mean, just look at grapes. How can you use water without wine mixed as drinking water? {nl}Even if the world is ending, you can't just drink plain water. That's barbaric! {nl}Hmm! Anyway, I appreciate the help. I'll listen to your story.
Baik,Aku melakukan kesalahan disini dan disana tetapi siapa yang tidak?{nl}IMaksudku,coba lihat anggur itu. bagaimana kamu bisa menggunakan air tanpa campuran wine sebagai air minum?{nl}Walaupun jika dunia berakhir,kamu tidak bisa hanya minum air polos, itu sangat barbar!{nl}Hmm! bagaimanapun juga aku menghargai bantuanmu, aku akan mendengarkan ceritamu.

Please select the user requiring a quest: I'm just listening! I'm not going to do what you say! {nl}I don't think wheat will grow here no matter what kind of magic you use. {nl}I need to look for my son's body, so you better keep it short!
Sampai dimana cerita itu terdengar! Pikiran yang keluar begitu saja apa adanya.{nl}Entah ilmu sihir ajaib apa yang dipakai, padahal tidak terpikir bahwa gandum dapat tumbuh di sini.{nl}Karena aku harus pergi memeriksa mayat anak lelaki, maka dari itu sebaiknya ini diakhiri sampai sini saja!

Please select the user requiring a quest: The wandering girl the farmers mentioned sounds suspicious. {nl}Elly agrees with me too. {nl}Looking at the facts together with her actions, we can't just dismiss her as an ordinary girl. {nl}Won't people in the Shaton family do anything about it?
Wandering girl yang dimaksud para petani terdengar mencurigakan.{nl}Elly juga setuju denganku.{nl}Mencari fakta bersama tentang apa yang dia lakukan, kita tidak bisa menghiraukan dia sebagai gadis biasa.{nl}Tidakkah orang-orang di keluarga Shaton bertindak sesuatu tentang ini?

Please select the user requiring a quest: And Medzio Diena came a few years after. {nl}My family barely made it out alive and this is what happened to the farm. {nl}That's not all. {nl}It was mentioned that a blue disaster will follow the great disaster.
Dan Medzio Diena datang beberapa tahun kemudian.{nl}Keluargaku baru saja membuatnya hidup dan ini adalah apa yang terjadi dengan ladang.{nl}Dan bukan itu saja.{nl}Itu sudah dimaksudkan kalau Blue disaster akan mengikuti The great disaster.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Think about it, it may have been a warning about those poisonous grapes. {nl}The true gold blessing will come after the blue disaster passes. I don't know what that means. {nl}I wanted to talk to her more but her father kicked her out saying she felt ominous. {nl}Where could she be wandering now...
Pikirkan hal ini, ini mungkin sudah jadi peringatan tentang anggur beracun itu.{nl}gold blessing yang sebenarnya akan muncul setelah Blue disaster terlewati.Aku tidak tahu apa maksudnya.{nl}Aku ingin berbicara lebih banyak dengannya tetapi ayahnya menendangnya dan berbicara dia merasa buruk. {nl}Dimana keberadaannya sekarang...

Please select the user requiring a quest: Thank you. {nl}Maybe we earned some of the master's trust. {nl}If so, then it's all thanks to you. {nl}Good luck...

Please select the user requiring a quest: I heard things went well at the Shaton Farm. {nl}That's a relief. I will discuss with the master about the large-scale purification and how to make it successful.
Aku mendengar sesuatu yang berjalan baik di ladang Shaton. {nl}Itu adalah bantuan. Aku akan berdiskusi dengan master tentang pemurnian skala besar dan bagaimana cara untuk membuatnya sukses.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Thank you. This will help many people recover.

Please select the user requiring a quest: It's a task of getting rid of the Lauzinutes across the underground tunnel. {nl}The owner's son disappeared in the underground tunnel long ago. It's creepy and I don't ever want to go in there.

Please select the user requiring a quest: They were once gentle monsters that suddenly grew vicious. {nl}Have you heard of anything else like that?

Please select the user requiring a quest: Many loved ones would have been lost if not for you. {nl}Why would someone do such a thing?

Please select the user requiring a quest: I didn't think we'd lack manpower since we're close to Klaipeda. {nl}I guess that was a mistake on my part. {nl}Well, at least we have enough soldiers to fight the large monsters.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Guarding the farm is tiring enough. {nl}How much time do the soldiers need to explore the Thorn Forest?

Please select the user requiring a quest: One or two monsters I can handle just fine. {nl}But, I don't think I can handle an entire flock though.

Please select the user requiring a quest: I'm standing guard here. {nl}It's better than the Eastern Woods since there are less monsters{nl}but it isn't exactly easy.

Please select the user requiring a quest: My colleagues' faces turned pale and they ran away. What's going on?

Please select the user requiring a quest: A Gorgon? Holy... I think I've seen one.

Please select the user requiring a quest: A tremendous monster was sighted here. Have you seen it?

Please select the user requiring a quest: It's a bit dubious, a monster hiding in a dead end like this. {nl}I can't just ignore the report though...

Please select the user requiring a quest: Crops from here will be brought to Klaipeda. {nl}I heard the farm has been corrupted with an evil energy.

Please select the user requiring a quest: The farm's cultivation just started so I'm the only one who received farmland. {nl}I wonder when they'll cultivate the whole area like this.
