For those who only wish to compete against other magicians, always focusing on their predecessors' achievements, there is a more of a chance this could happen.{nl}
...Manusia bisa mengalami permasalah psikologis karena berfokus pada hal yang sama terlalu lama; ini terjadi bukan hanya karena magic tetapi juga dari hal-hal yang umum.{nl}Khusus para magician di Mage Tower... Mereka hanya ingin bersaing dengan para magician lain, selalu berfokus pada pencapaian pendahulu mereka, kemungkinan ini akan sangat besar terjadi pada mereka.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: So who should be in charge of controlling and preventing these issues for other magicians?{nl}Without us Psychokinos to watch over them, another magician could easily slip into madness, and should he or she be powerful enough, there is no knowing what things they could be capable of in the Mage Tower or out in the world.{nl}Antares is one such powerful magician...{nl}
Jadi siapa yang harus bertanggung jawab mengendalikan dan mencegah masalah para magician ini?{nl}Tanpa kami Psychokinos yang mengawasi mereka, para magician dapat dengan mudah mengalami kegilaan, dan mereka cukup kuat, tidak ada yang mengetahui hal-hal apa yang bisa mereka lakukan di Mage Tower atau di luar sana.{nl}Antares merupakan salah satu magician yang kuat...{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: (The book shelf is broken.)
(Rak buku The rusak.)

Please select the user requiring a quest: I believe the role of Psychokinos has become even more important now that world has fallen into catastrophe.{nl}We must watch over the clerics who are now lost without the goddesses, we must control and defeat the monsters that roam our world and take on all responsibilities.{nl}
Saya percaya peran Psychokinos menjadi sangat penting sekarang ini ketika dunia berada dalam malapetaka.{nl}Kami harus mengawasi para cleric yang sekarang kehilangan para Goddess , kami harus mengendalikan dan mengalahkan para monster yang berkeliaran dan bertanggung jawab akan semuanya.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: Try as we might it's hard to tell whether the duties taken by the goddesses in the past can be eased up.{nl}
Kami mencoba sebisa mungkin namun sulit untuk mengatakan apakah tugas yang sebelumnya dilakukan oleh para Goddess  bisa berangsur-angsur berkurang.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: For example if you find the legendary fantastic library, helping the goddesses inside or, should they be absent even there, restoring and maintaining it could become an enourmous task...
Seandainya jika kamu menemukan perpustakaan fantastis yang legendaris, membantu para goddsess didalamnya atau, bahkan mereka tidak ada disana, memulihkan dan mempertahankannya merupakan tugas yang sangat besarâ€¦

Please select the user requiring a quest: Wizards are magicians who are the most devoted to fundamental magic.{nl}Isn't going back to the basics the best way to start exploring stronger types of magic?
Wizards merupakan magician yang paling berdedikasi terhadap fundamental magic.{nl}Bukankah kembali ke dasar merupakan cara terbaik untuk memulai eksplorasi jenis magic yang lebih kuat?

Please select the user requiring a quest: Using strong spells to channel strong magic is standard,{nl}but don't depend on only one kind of magic.{nl}You must learn how to conjugate different branches of it.
Menggunakan mantra untuk mengeluarkan kekuatan Magic merupakan hal umum.{nl}Tapi jangan hanya bergantung pada satu jenis Magic,{nl}kamu harus belajar bagaimana berhamonisasi dengan berbagai kemampuan Magic lainnya.

Please select the user requiring a quest: The settlers who came to Orsha feel uneasy at the sight of the tree roots surrounding the walls.{nl}They want to burn them but are afraid that Orsha will burn down with them as well.
Para pendatang yang mengunjungi Orsha merasa tidak nyaman saat melihat akar pohon yang mengelilingi dinding Orsha.{nl}Mereka ingin membakarnya tetapi takut bila Orsha ikut terbakar bersamanya.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Our fiery magic is what sets Pyromancers apart from the others.{nl}But if you play with fire you can't control, you'll be nothing but a pyromaniac.
Magic Api kami yang membuat Pyromancer menjadi spesial.{nl}Namun, jika kamu bermain dengan api yang tidak bisa kamu kendalikan, maka kamu hanyalah seorang pyromaniac.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: Turning bad situations around is what Cryomancers do.{nl}Our cold composure is the main source of our magical power.
Mengendalikan situasi buruk yang terjadi adalah tugas Cryomancers.{nl}ketenangan kami yang dingin adalah sumber utama kekuatan magic kami.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Cryomancers must remain cold and prudent at all times.{nl}Conceit, carelessness, and indolence will be the end of you.
Cryomancers harus tetap dingin dan bijaksana setiap saat.{nl}Kesombongan, kecerobohan dan kemalasan dapat mengakhiri hidupmu.

Please select the user requiring a quest: There are so many people in Orsha now, you can't tell who's a settler and who's a refugee.{nl}I wonder if it's not too much for our lord to handle...
Ada begitu banyak orang di Orsha sekarang, Kamu tidak bisa membedakan yang mana pendatang dan mana pengungsi.{nl}Aku ingin tahu apakah ini tidak terlalu banyak untuk ditangain oleh penguasa kitaâ€¦

Please select the user requiring a quest: Psychokinos' brand of magic is different compared to other types.{nl}Believe in yourself and have confidence with endless limits.{nl}These are the sources of the Psychokinos' magical power.
Jenis magic Psychokinos berbeda bila dibandingkan dengan jenis magic lainnya.{nl}Percaya pada kemampuan diri dan memiliki rasa percaya diri tanpa terbatas.{nl}Ini adalah sumber kekuatan magic dari Psychokinos.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Even after Medzio Diena we've had our hands full with all sorts of problems.{nl}And we might just be facing the most important of them all.
Bahkan setelah Medzio Diena kami disibukkan dengan menangani berbagai macam masalah.{nl}Dan mungkin kita akan menghadapi masalah yang paling penting dari itu semua.

Please select the user requiring a quest: All beings in this world are connected in some way.{nl}We can end all conflicts if we accept each other as one and the same.
Semua makhluk di dunia ini, terhubung dengan berbagai cara.{nl}Kita bisa mengakhiri semua konflik bila kita menerima satu sama lain dan bersatu.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Shapeshifting is a very profound type of magic, but simply learning it will not make you stronger.{nl}If you can't use it in battle, you're better off learning something else.
Shapeshifting adalah tipe magic yang sangat mendalam, namun dengan mempelajarinya saja, tidak akan membuatmu menjadi kuat.{nl}Jika kamu tidak bisa menggunakannya pada pertempuran, maka lebih baik kamu mempelajari magic lain.

Please select the user requiring a quest: For Thaumaturges, it's the battle that matters.{nl}You need to control others' properties and shapes in a way that's favorable to you.
Untuk Thaumaturges, pertempuran merupakan hal yang penting.{nl}Kamu harus mengontrol sifat dan bentuk lain yang dapat menguntungkanmu dalam pertempuran.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Orsha is also being plagued with all sorts of incidents, so nothing's been going as planned.{nl}What we really need now are strong and talented people who can help us.
Orsha terganggu dengan berbagai macam petaka, sehingga tidak ada jalan keluar.{nl}Apa yang kita benar-benar butuhkan sekarang adalah orang-orang berbakat yang bisa membantu kita.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Elementalists don't focus on a single property.{nl}We combine various different elemental properties in an efficient way.
Kami tidak berfokus pada satu elemen.{nl}Kami Elementalists menggabungkan berbagai sifat unsur yang berbeda dengan cara yang efisien.

Please select the user requiring a quest: The advantage of using a bow is that you can finish an opponent from afar.{nl}Of course that is meaningless if you can't aim, haha.
Keuntungan dengan menggunakan busur ialah kamu dapat menghabisi lawan dari kejauhan.{nl} Tentu saja itu tidak akan berarti bila kamu tidak dapat membidik dengan tepat, haha.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Archers are already invincible to any opponent out there, {nl}but there is one type that actually makes them stronger.{nl}I'm talking about the flying-type enemies with cloth armor.
Archer tak terkalahkan bila melawan musuh di luar sana,{nl}tapi ada satu hal yang benar-benar membuat mereka menjadi lebih kuat.{nl} Yaitu musuh tipe terbang dengan cloth armor.

Please select the user requiring a quest: If you run away when there's too many enemies, look somewhere else.{nl}I'm not into defeating only one enemy at a time.
Jika kamu lari karena ada terlalu banyak musuh, carilah tempat lain.{nl}Aku bukanlah tipe yang mengalahkan musuh satu per satu.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Rangers' techniques are specialized in handling multiple opponents at once.{nl}If you're going to defend this many settlers, wouldn't these techniques be an advantage for you?
Spesialisasi Teknik seorang Rangers adalah untuk menangani beberapa musuh sekaligus.{nl}Jika Kamu ingin melindungi para pendatang disini, bukankah ini sangat cocok untukmu?

Please select the user requiring a quest: Shields, rocks, monsters, you need to use anything you can.{nl}There's no such thing as being shy in battle.
Shields, batu, monster, Kamu harus menggunakan apa pun yang kamu bisa.{nl}Tidak usah malu-malu ketika dalam pertempuran.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Of course flashy techniques are good too...{nl}When you're not hurt and in no danger to die, that is.
Tentu saja teknik yang keren juga diperlukan... {nl} Bila kamu tidak terluka dan dalam bahaya.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Using traps to affect many enemies at once is the specialty of Sappers.{nl}We use techniques adopted from military engineering.
Menggunakan perangkap untuk melukai banyak musuh sekaligus adalah spesialisasi sappers.{nl}Kami menggunakan teknik yang diadopsi dari teknik militer.

Please select the user requiring a quest: I believe a Sapper always needs to be cautious.{nl}Any trap you set up can completely change the outcome of the battle.
Saya yakin seorang Sapper selalu harus waspada.{nl}Setiap Jebakan yang kamu letakkan dapat mengubah hasil pertempuran.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Hunters aren't Hunters without their companions.{nl}Companions aren't just comrades in arms, they are trustworthy friends.
Kamu tidak bisa memisahkan Hunters tanpa companion.{nl}Mereka bukan hanya teman dalam pertempuran, tetapi juga kawan yang bisa dipercaya.

Please select the user requiring a quest: No one can escape a Hunter's sight.{nl}They can find and defeat even hidden enemies.
Tidak ada yang bisa lepas dari penglihatan Hunter.{nl}Mereka dapat menemukan dan mengalahkan musuh yang tersembunyi.

Please select the user requiring a quest: My twin sister, May Patt, is the Wugushi Submaster who's currently far away in Klaipeda.{nl}Orsha is bad enough, but I can't imagine how things are over there...
Saudara kembarku May Patt adalah Wugushi submaster di Klaipeda.{nl}Kondisi Orsha sudah cukup buruk, namun aku membayangkan apa yang terjadi disanaâ€¦

Please select the user requiring a quest: Since poison is Wugishis' specialty, people tend to avoid them out of fear.{nl}It's not like they use poison everywhere they go, so there's no real reason to worry.{nl}...Although, I suppose that doesn't change the fact that poison is actually dangerous.
Wugushi selalu berurusan dengan racun, sehingga orang-orang cenderung menghindari mereka karena takut.{nl}Meskipun begitu tidak ada yang perlu dikhawatirkan karena mereka tidak menggunakan racun secara sembarangan.{nl}Namun kurasa, racun sangatlah berbahaya.

Please select the user requiring a quest: I heard that people outside of Orsha are still escaping.{nl}They say there are even people who can't get into Orsha... The situation is really bad.
Aku mendengar bahwa orang-orang di luar Orsha masih mencari tempat yang aman.{nl}Mereka mengatakan ada orang yang bahkan tidak bisa memasuki Orsha... Situasi ini benar-benar buruk.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Scouts are experts in reconaissance and infiltrating enemy camps.{nl}We hide ourselves from our enemies and attack when they least expect it.
Scout adalah pakar dalam menyusup dan mengintai camp musuh.{nl}Kami bersembunyi dari musuh dan menyerang ketika mereka tidak menyadarinya.

Empty Scroll

(Tidak ada yang tertulis di dalamnya.)

Scroll With Writings

Please select the user requiring a quest: Three years have passed since Medzio Diena and still no news of their life or death, much less their whereabouts.{nl}As we can no longer dwell on this task, the search for our allies lost during Medzio Diena and the royal family's objects will be temporarily suspended.{nl}Return to the assembly area as soon as you receive this command.{nl}-{nl}Yura Swanjone
Tiga tahun telah berlalu semenjak Medzio Diena dan masih tidak ada kabar hidup atau mati mereka, apalagi keberadaan mereka.{nl}Sepertinya kita tidak bisa lagi menjalankan tugas ini, pencarian sekutu yang hilang selama Medzio Diena dan benda-benda keluarga kerajaan akan ditunda sementara{nl}Kembali ke tempat pertemuan setelah kamu menerima perintah ini{nl}-{nl}Yura Swanjone

Please select the user requiring a quest: Hmm?{nl}That scroll...{nl}
Hmm?{nl}Scroll Itu...{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: I know what this is.{nl}It's a secret document that you have to spray with a special solution to make the letters appear.{nl}
Aku tahu apa ini.{nl}Ini adalah dokumen rahasia yang harus kamu percikkan dengan larutan khusus untuk membuat huruf-hurufnya muncul.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: Huh, it's been a while.{nl}Us Scouts use this too sometimes.{nl}
Huh, belum lama ini.{nl}Kami Scout juga kadang-kadang menggunakannya.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: I'm not sure I can make the solution that makes letters appear for you... {nl}But I can tell you how it's made.{nl}It's a bit complicated, but if you follow the instructions you should be good.
Aku tidak yakin bisa memberikan solusi untukmu agar huruf-huruf itu bisa muncul...{nl}Namun saya dapat memberitahumu bagaimana itu dibuat.{nl}Ini agak rumit, tetapi jika kamu mengikuti sesuai petunjuk seharusnya kamu bisa.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Who are you?{nl}If you don't tell me the truth about how you got that scroll all the way here...{nl}I'm afraid you'll have to say goodbye to this world.{nl}
Siapa kamu?{nl}Jika kamu tidak mengatakan dengan jujur, bagaimana kamu bisa memiliki semua scroll ini...{nl}Aku takut kamu harus mengucapkan selamat tinggal kepada dunia ini.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: Are you saying you can read the secret writings on the scroll AND came to find me?{nl}That's unexpected... Ah, I'm sorry for what I said earlier.{nl}
Apa yang kamu katakan, kamu dapat membaca tulisan rahasia pada scroll dan datang mencariku?{nl}Ini sungguh tak terduga... Ah, aku minta maaf atas perkataanku sebelumnya.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: I gave that scroll to another Shinobi.{nl}One that is no longer among us... Having it end up here again really brings back memories.
Saya memberikan beberapa scroll itu kepada Shinobi lain.{nl}Mereka yang tidak lagi berada di antara kita... kembali lagi kesini, benar-benar kembali membawa kenangan.

Please select the user requiring a quest: But thank you, really.{nl}I cannot ask you to take this as my apology,{nl}but if you're curious about the path of the Shinobi you can always visit me.{nl}
Namun sungguh, terima kasih.{nl}Saya tidak bisa memberimu ini sebagai permintaan maaf saya,{nl} tetapi jika kamu ingin tahu tentang Shinobi kamu bisa datang berkunjung.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: I mean, I can find out for you anything you want to know about the Shinobi.{nl}Since I am one myself, I could teach you to become one.
Maksudku, aku bisa mencari tahu apa pun yang ingin kamu ketahui tentang Shinobi.{nl} Karena saya adalah salah satunya.

Please select the user requiring a quest: All I can give you as my apology is the techniques of the Shinobi...{nl}But, that doesn't seem to suit you, so I can't even give you that.{nl}
Semua saya dapat aku berikan kepadamu sebagai permintaan maaf adalah teknik Shinobi...{nl} Namun, tampaknya ini tidak sesuai denganmu, jadi saya tidak bisa memberikannya kepadamu.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: I really appreciate it.{nl}Oh, and please don't tell anyone I'm here, alright?
Saya sangat menghargainya.{nl}Oh, dan jangan bilang siapapun mengenai keberadaanku di sini, Ok?

Unidentified Cube

Please select the user requiring a quest: Have you had the honor of meeting the Chaplain Master?{nl}I was so moved when the he spoke to each one of us, lowly soldiers ever so kindly.
Apakah Kamu memiliki kehormatan memenuhi Chaplain Master? {nl} aku begitu tersentuh ketika ia berbicara kepada kita masing-masing, tentara rendahan pernah begitu baik.

Please select the user requiring a quest: It has been said that he is present here gracing the soldiers of Orsha.{nl}I am not sure if the he is still with them or not.
Telah mengatakan bahwa dia hadir di sini tentara kehormatan dari Orsha. {nl} aku tidak yakin jika dia masih dengan mereka atau tidak.

Please select the user requiring a quest: It was a few days ago.{nl}The Chaplain Master came here and asked us certain questions.{nl}
Itu beberapa hari lalu.{nl}Chaplain Master datang ke sini dan bertanya kepada kami beberapa pertanyaan.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: It seemed like he is helping in the efforts to penetrate the Gateway of the Great King...{nl}Also, he had some business with the Cleric Masters in Klaipeda.
Sepertinya dia membantu dalam upaya untuk menembus Gateway of the Great King ... {nl} Selain itu, ia memiliki beberapa bisnis dengan Cleric Master di Klaipeda.

Please select the user requiring a quest: We had the honor of meeting the Chaplain Master.{nl}I was so moved when the he spoke to each one of us, lowly soldiers ever so kindly.
Kami memiliki kehormatan memenuhi Chaplain Master. {nl} aku begitu tersentuh ketika ia berbicara kepada kita masing-masing, tentara rendahan pernah begitu baik.

Please select the user requiring a quest: I think the he will be visiting the soldiers in the East Siauliai Woods...{nl}I am not sure if he is still there.{nl}{nl}
Aku pikir dia akan mengunjungi tentara di East Siauliai Woods ... {nl} aku tidak yakin apakah ia masih ada. {nl} {nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: It was a few days ago.{nl}The Chaplain Master came here and asked us certain questions.{nl}Seemed to be helping in the efforts to penetrate the Gateway of the Great King.{nl}
Itu beberapa hari lalu. {nl} Chaplain Master datang ke sini dan meminta kami pertanyaan tertentu. {nl} Tampaknya akan membantu dalam upaya untuk menembus Gateway of the Great King. {nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: I'm not exactly sure, but the he did say was he going to meet the Cleric Masters in Klaipeda.{nl}Perhaps, you might see him there?
Aku tidak yakin, tapi dia mengatakan akan menemui Cleric Master di Klaipeda.{nl}Mungkin, kamu akan bertemu dia di sana?

Please select the user requiring a quest: You mean the Chaplain Master?{nl}He seemed to be busy with royal business.{nl}
Maksud kamu Chaplain Master?{nl}Dia terlihat sibuk dengan bisnis kerajaan.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: The Master even asked to to supply Holy Water and deploy the clerics.{nl}The Master asked to be sent to the Commander Julian's Army. You can probably meet the Master there.
Master bahkan diminta untuk memasok air suci dan menyebarkan cleric. {nl} Master meminta untuk dikirim ke Commander Julian's Army. Kamu mungkin dapat bertemu Master di sana.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Chaplain Master
Chaplain Master

Please select the user requiring a quest: Oh, aren't you the Revelator whom everyone has been talking about?{nl}
Oh, ya apakah kamu Savior yang semua orang bicarakan selama ini? {nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: Just as I expected. {nl}I have heard a lot from the Priest Master about you.{nl}
Seperti yang aku harapkan. {nl}Aku mendengar banyak dari Priest Master tentang kamu.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: Even I could certainly tell how great a Priest you are.{nl}
Bahkan aku pasti tahu kamu adalah priest terkenal. {nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: I want someone like you to be a Chaplain.{nl}These words are not hollow lipservice so, please, consider it in the most serious way.{nl}
Aku ingin orang sepertimu menjadi Chaplain.{nl}Kata-kata ini bukan cuma dibibir saja, mohon, pertimbangkan dengan serius.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: As you can, surely, see. We are trying to create a path to the Gateway of the Great King.{nl}Quite a reckless task... But if we do not establish the path, {nl}the exchange with Fedimian would diminish and get extinguished altogether soon.
Seperti yang Kamu bisa, pasti, lihat. Kami berusaha untuk membuat jalan ke Gateway of the Great King. {nl} Sebuah tugas nekat ... Tapi jika kita tidak membangun jalan, {nl} pertukaran dengan Fedimian akan berkurang dan mendapatkan sama sekali mati segera.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Everyone is tired but none ever show it.{nl}I also am willing to help the troops the best I can.
Semua orang lelah tetapi tidak pernah menunjukkannya. {nl} Aku juga bersedia untuk membantu pasukan yang terbaik yang aku bisa.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Be careful, the terminal can only be handled at a particular time...{nl}The curse needs to be cleared out.
Hati-hati, terminal itu hanya dapat bekerja pada waktu-waktu tertentu... {nl}Kutukan itu perlu dibersihkan.

Please select the user requiring a quest: The demons are after the Light of Salvation.{nl}
Para demon mengincar cahaya salvation.{nl}

Orsha Resident

Please select the user requiring a quest: Do you know about the legend that's been passed down in Orsha?{nl}Everyone in Orsha knows this story.{nl}
Apakah kamu tahu mengenai legenda yang diwariskan secara turun menurun di Orsha?{nl}Semua orang di Orsha mengetahui cerita ini.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: A long time ago there was a young shepherd who lived in Orsha.{nl}One day he went out to the outskirts of the city with his sheep and there he met a girl.{nl}
Dahulu kala ada seorang shepherd muda yang tinggal di Orsha.{nl}Suatu hari ia pergi ke pinggiran kota bersama domba-dombanya dan di sana ia bertemu dengan seorang gadis.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: After that, the shepherd and the girl would often meet and play together.{nl}They say the girl didn't talk much and could only string together a few simple words.{nl}
Setelah itu, sang shepherd dan gadis itu sering bertemu dan bermain bersama.{nl}Mereka mengatakan gadis itu tidak banyak bicara dan hanya bisa mengucapkan beberapa kata sederhana.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: Then... something strange happened.{nl}Everything the girl had told the shepherd, big and small things, eventually happened.{nl}
Kemudian... sesuatu yang aneh terjadi.{nl}Semua yang gadis itu katakan kepada shepherd, baik hal-hal besar maupun kecil, akhirnya terjadi.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: The shepherd thought it was marvelous, so he told his uncle Bloele about the girl.{nl}Bloele was a highly respected priest in Orsha.{nl}
Shepherd berpikir itu luar biasa, sehingga ia menceritakan mengenai gadis itu kepada pamannya Bloele.{nl} Bloele adalah seorang priest yang sangat dihormati di Orsha.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: Bloele listened to his nephew's story and figured he shouldn't ignore it.{nl}The next day he went out to meet the girl with his nephew.{nl}
Bloele mendengarkan cerita keponakannya dan ia merasa tidak boleh mengabaikannya.{nl}Keesokan harinya ia pergi untuk menemui gadis itu bersama keponakannya.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: Bloele treated the girl as if he were meeting one of the goddesses.{nl}When she saw him, without saying a word, the girl drew something on the ground.{nl}
Bloele memperlakukan gadis itu seakan-akan ia bertemu dengan salah satu Goddess.{nl}Ketika ia melihatnya, tanpa mengucapkan sepatah katapun, sang gadis menggambar sesuatu di tanah.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: Bloele stepped on the girl's magical drawing and {nl}immediately he saw something slowly appearing in his mind.{nl}Three important events... Bloele was a priest so he knew how important they were.{nl}
Bloele berdiri di atas gambar magic gadis itu dan{nl}ia melihat sesuatu yang secara perlahan-lahan muncul di benaknya.{nl}Tiga peristiwa penting... Bloele adalah seorang priest sehingga ia tahu betapa pentingnya itu.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: Medzio Diena... Orsha's disaster...{nl}And another one he only told the bishops in Orsha.{nl}
Medzio Diena... Bencana Orsha... {nl} Dan satu lagi ia hanya mengatakannya kepada para bishop di Orsha.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: After that the girl was never seen again and the shepherd went on to become a brilliant cleric.{nl}Now, Medzio Diena and the destruction of Orsha already happened, {nl}so what could be the other event?
Setelah itu sang gadis tidak pernah terlihat lagi dan sang shepherd kemudian menjadi seorang cleric yang brilian.{nl}Sekarang, Medzio Diena dan bencana Orsha sudah terjadi,{nl} Sehingga apa yang akan terjadi berikutnya?

Please select the user requiring a quest: Girl Settler
Girl Settler

Please select the user requiring a quest: I can't help but to worry every time I look at the statue of the goddess.{nl}Everything is so uncertain without the goddesses... What will happen to us?
Aku selalu khawatir setiap kali melihat patung Goddess .{nl}Semuanya begitu tidak pasti tanpa adanya Goddess ... Apa yang akan terjadi kepada kita?

Please select the user requiring a quest: Our kingdom has five great goddesses, as you probably know.{nl}There are also many other goddesses that help them.{nl}
Kerajaan kami memiliki lima great Goddesses, mungkin kamu sudah mengetahuinya.{nl} Juga ada para Goddess  lain yang membantu mereka.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: But now we don't know where any of them are.
Namun kami tidak tahu di mana keberadaan salah satu dari mereka.

Please select the user requiring a quest: The one you see in front of you is the Statue of Goddess Ausrine.{nl}She is in charge of the dawn and is the one who leads all the other goddesses.{nl}
Salah satu yang kamu lihat di depan adalah Patung Goddess Ausrine.{nl} Ia bertanggung jawab akan hadirnya fajar dan merupakan salah satu yang memimpin semua Goddess .{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: Also, you've probably heard people say someone "returns to the goddess" when they pass away.{nl}By that, they mean Goddess Ausrine.
Kamu mungkin juga pernah mendengar seseorang mengatakan "kembali ke Goddess " ketika mereka meninggal.{nl} itu ditujukan kepada Goddess Ausrine.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Goddess Gabija is in charge of fire.{nl}People who mainly deal with housework often pray to her.{nl}
Goddess Gabija bertanggung jawab atas api.{nl} Orang-orang yangberhubungan dengan pekerjaan rumah tangga sering berdoa kepadanya.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: They do it so their houses will be warm as well as their food.{nl}As for magicians... Well, shouldn't they have to pray even more?
Mereka melakukannya agar rumah serta makanan mereka tetap hangat.{nl}Sebagai Magician... Yah, bukankah seharusnya mereka harus berdoa lebih banyak?

Please select the user requiring a quest: Goddess Zemyna is the goddess of earth.{nl}She is in charge of lands and crops.{nl}
Goddess Zemyna adalah Goddess Bumi.{nl}Ia bertanggung jawab atas tanah dan tanaman.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: My family farms for a living so we always pray to Goddess Zemyna.{nl}It's very hard to grow good potatoes without her blessing.
Kami hidup dari peternakan keluarga sehingga kami selalu berdoa kepada Goddess Zemyna.{nl}Sangat sulit untuk menanam kentang yang bagus tanpa berkah darinya.

Please select the user requiring a quest: However, after Medzio Diena we've had plants growing everywhere.{nl}I wonder how Goddess Zemyna feels about that.
Namun, setelah Medzio Diena kami sudah menanam tanaman dimana-mana.{nl}Aku bertanya-tanya Apa yang Goddess Zemyna rasakan mengenai itu.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Goddess Vakarine is in charge of the night stars.{nl}She is also the one who wakes up Goddess Ausrine for the following day.{nl}Her symbol is the red star that shines in the night sky.{nl}
Goddess Vakarine bertanggung jawab atas bintang-bintang malam.{nl}Ia salah satu yang membangunkan Goddess Ausrine di keesokan harinya.{nl}Simbolnya adalah bintang merah yang bersinar di langit malam.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: Vakarine is also the goddess of vitality and repose,{nl}and can be considered a guardian of travelers like yourself.{nl}If your feet hurt, just say the name Goddess Vakarine three times, it will help.
Vakarine merupakan Goddess  kesehatan dan kedamaian,{nl}juga dianggap sebagai penjaga para petualang sepertimu.{nl}Jika kakimu sakit, hanya menyebut nama Goddess Vakarine tiga kali, itu akan menolongmu.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Goddess Laima... Hmm... I'm not sure.{nl}I'm sure the priests will know...{nl}
Goddess Laima... Hmm... Saya tidak begitu yakin.{nl}Saya yakin para priest mengetahuinya...{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: She's said to be the goddess of fate and foresight, but she hasn't really showed herself.{nl}I wonder, could Goddess Laima have been aware of all these catastrophes?
Ia merupakan Goddess takdir dan ramalan,tetapi ia belum menunjukkan keberadaan dirinya.{nl}Aku bertanya-tanya, Bukankah seharusnya Goddess Laima telah menyadari semua bencana ini?

Please select the user requiring a quest: Young Settler
Young Settler

Please select the user requiring a quest: To think I barely made it into Orsha...{nl}I thought it would be safe here, but it's just like Medzio Diena!
Aku baru sampai di Orsha...{nl}Aku kira akan aman berada di sini, namun ini seperti saat Medzio Diena!

Please select the user requiring a quest: I heard about Orsha before coming here.{nl}They said the fortress walls had been covered with tree roots during Medzio Diena.{nl}
Aku mendengar apa yang terjadi di Orsha sebelum datang ke sini.{nl}Mereka mengatakan seluruh tembok benteng telah ditutupi oleh akar-akar pohon selama Medzio Diena.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: But Medzio Diena ended four years ago now.{nl}
Tetapi Medzio Diena telah berakhir empat tahun yang lalu.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: Didn't they tell us to come here because it was safe?{nl}I really don't know what to think of this...
Bukankah mereka memberitahu kita untuk datang ke sini karena disini aman?{nl}Aku benar-benar tidak tahu apa yang harus dilakukanâ€¦

Please select the user requiring a quest: On Medzio Diena everything was chaos.{nl}These are all things I heard but... {nl}They say that a terrible catastrophe happened on a night four years ago.{nl}
Saat Medzio Diena semuanya dalam kekacauan.{nl}Itulah hal yang ku dengar tetapi...{nl} Mereka mengatakan empat tahun yang lalu pada suatu malam bencana yang mengerikan terjadi.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: Apparently it was worse in the capital.{nl}They say a gigantic tree bursted up from somewhere deep in the ground there.{nl}
Tampaknya hal yang lebih buruk terjadi di capital.{nl}Mereka mengatakan pohon raksasa keluar dari dalam tanah di capital.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: The capital was completely destroyed.{nl}The survivors say that the grounds and the skies all collapsed.{nl}
Capital telah hancur sepenuhnya.{nl}Para korban yang selamat mengatakan bahwa bumi dan langit seakan runtuh.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: And that's not all, just look at Orsha. Do you see the walls all covered in roots?{nl}Fedimian too is completely taken over except for the Holy District.{nl}
Dan tidak hanya itu saja, lihatlah keadaan Orsha. Tidakkah kamu melihat semua dinding tertutup dengan akar?{nl}Fedimian juga mengalami hal yang sama kecuali Holy Distict.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: The aftermath of Medzio Diena reached all the way to the small villages.{nl}The trees and plants suddenly grew bigger, turning into monsters...{nl}
Setelah Mezio Diena mencapai desa-desa kecil.{nl}Pohon-pohon dan tanaman tiba-tiba tumbuh menjadi besar, dan berubah menjadi monster...{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: And where do you think those monsters went?{nl}They invaded the villages and left them devastated.{nl}
Dan kemana menurutmu para monster itu pergi?{nl}Mereka menyerbu desa-desa dan menghancurkannya.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: This was four years ago but everything stays the same.{nl}What on earth could the missing goddesses be doing...?
Ini terjadi empat tahun lalu tapi semuanya masih tetap sama.{nl}Apa yang terjadi sehingga para Goddess  bisa menghilang...?

Please select the user requiring a quest: We can just keep growing more bracken, we have someone to do that!{nl}No one can stop miss Giltine's plan.
Kami hanya bisa terus menanam lebih banyak tanaman pakis, kami memiliki seseorang untuk mengerjakannya! {nl}Tidak ada yang bisa menghentikan rencana Giltine.

Please select the user requiring a quest: It must have been completely exhausted.{nl}It was Laswi who protected us from the demons.

Please select the user requiring a quest: I don't want to return to the goddess!{nl}Please help me...
Aku tidak ingin kembali kepada Goddess !{nl} Tolong aku...

Please select the user requiring a quest: Do you have a stamina recovery potion?

Please select the user requiring a quest: It was a black liquid.{nl}Just bring me anything. I'll put it in the device and check.
Itu berbentuk cairan hitam.{nl}Berikan aku semuanya. Aku akan memasukkannya ke dalam device dan memeriksa.

Please select the user requiring a quest: The device inside the main building's atrium seems to{nl}be the protective shield device Edmundas mentioned.
Device yang berada di dalam bangunan utama atrium tampaknya{nl}merupakan protective shield device yang Edmundas maksud.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Suddenly, I realized.{nl}In the beginning I almost gave my life away a few times for insignificant things...{nl}Yes... I realized that.
Tiba-tiba, aku menyadari.{nl}Aku hampir kehilangan nyawa beberapa kali untuk hal-hal yang tidak penting...{nl}Ya... aku menyadarinya.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Everything has a meaning.{nl}The essence is in the soul.{nl}
Semua ada maknanya.{nl}Esensinya berada di dalam soul.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: I decided to set up more traps to keep everyone from knowing about this horrible truth.{nl}I can't destroy them. I can't do it...{nl}
Aku memutuskan untuk meletakkan lebih banyak jebakan agar semua orang tidak mengetahui tentang kebenaran yang mengerikan ini.{nl}Aku tidak bisa menghancurkannya. Aku tidak bisa melakukannya...{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: You too can't escape from here.{nl}If you're looking at this tombstone, doesn't that mean you saw it too?{nl}
Kamu juga tidak bisa keluar dari sini.{nl}Jika kamu sedang melihat batu tombstone ini, bukankah berarti kamu telah melihatnya juga?{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: Now something really horrible is about to happen.
Sekarang sesuatu yang sangat mengerikan akan terjadi.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Kruvina already proved its power at Bellai Rainforest.{nl}But nowhere connects to the Pelke Shrine Ruins here in Dadan Jungle.{nl}I need to use the device...
Kruvina sudah membuktikan kemampuannya di Bellai Rainforest.{nl}tetapi tak satu pun terhubung ke Pelke Shrine Ruins di Dadan Jungle.{nl}Aku perlu menggunakan deviceâ€¦

Please select the user requiring a quest: My giant bracken plan is running smoothly.{nl}I just need someone who is qualified to control it.{nl}I also need a lot more aconite and plant materials to breed the spores.{nl}I will move the distillery to Dadan Jungle in order to extract the components needed.
Rencana besar tumbuhan pakisku berjalan dengan lancar.{nl}Aku membutuhkan seseorang yang memenuhi kualifikasi untuk mengontrolnya.{nl}Aku juga perlu lebih banyak aconite dan object tanaman untuk mengembang biakkan sporanya.{nl}Aku akan memindahkan penyulingannya ke Dadan Jungle untuk mengekstrak komponen yang diperlukan.

Pengembang biakan, ketahanan, kematian, daya tahan terhadap cuaca, dan lainnya.{nl}Aku harus mengumpulkan data sebanyak mungkin.{nl}Aku mungkin bisa mendapatkan cukup subyek eksperimen dari desa terdekat.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Dadan Jungle Experiment Journal, Page 3
Dadan Jungle Experiment Journal Halaman 3

Please select the user requiring a quest: I need to think of a way to avoid overheating in the device's source of energy.{nl}I think a cooling spell could prevent overheating {nl}and protect the source of energy at the same time.
Aku harus memikirkan cara untuk menghindari sumber energi device dari overheat.{nl} Kurasa mantra pendinginan dapat mencegah overheat{nl}dan melindungi sumber energi secara bersamaan.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Welcome!{nl}Sockets, repairs, recipes... you can leave that all to me.
Selamat datang!{nl}Sockets, repairs, recipes... Kamu bisa menyerahkan semuanya kepadaku.

Please select the user requiring a quest: We can't accept too many new requests since supplies became scarce after the migration order.{nl}I'm just as skilled as my father though, so don't be afraid to ask me for anything!
Setelah pemesanan persediaan keimigrasian menjadi langka membuat kami tidak bisa selalu menerima permintaan baru.{nl}Namun keterampilanku sama seperti ayahku, jadi jangan khawatir untuk meminta bantuanku!

Please select the user requiring a quest: I sure have my hands full with the reconstruction of Orsha and the migration order.{nl}But when it comes to equipment you can bet I have the best!
Aku sangat sibuk dengan rekonstruksi Orsha dan keimigrasian.{nl}Namun bila itu berhubungan dengan equipment maka kamu dapat mengandalkanku, aku memiliki yang terbaik!

Please select the user requiring a quest: I'm only a shop assistant so I can't give you a discount.{nl}I'll talk to the owner. Meanwhile, feel free to look around!
Aku hanya seorang asisten toko sehingga aku tidak bisa memberikanmu diskon.{nl} Aku akan bicara kepada pemilik toko. Sementara itu, silahkan melihat-lihat!

Please select the user requiring a quest: Item Merchant Alf
Item Merchant Alf

Please select the user requiring a quest: After the migration order I made more friends, {nl}but my father is having a hard time obtaining items.{nl}We still sell the best ones though, so look around!
Setelah keimigrasian aku mendapat lebih banyak teman,{nl}namun ayah saya cukup kesulitan untuk mendapatkan barang-barang.{nl}Kami masih menjual yang terbaik, jadi silahkan melihat-lihat!

Please select the user requiring a quest: My father was hurt during Medzio Diena, so I'm helping him look after the shop.{nl}Feel free to look around!
Ayahku terluka ketika Medzio Diena, sehingga aku membantunya menjaga toko.{nl}Jangan ragu untuk melihat-lihat!

Please select the user requiring a quest: I can no longer trade with Fedimian because of the monsters, but I still have some stock left.{nl}Feel free to come anytime; I'm working hard, too.
Aku tidak bisa berdagang lagi di Fedimian karena para monster, namun aku masih memiliki beberapa modal yang tersisa{nl}Jangan ragu untuk datang kapan saja. Aku juga akan bekerja keras.

Please select the user requiring a quest: It may be a little chaotic now, but Orsha is a nice place.{nl}So, what can I get for you?
Mungkin ini sekarang sedikit kacau, tapi Orsha adalah tempat yang bagus.{nl}Jadi, apa yang bisa aku bantu untukmu?

Please select the user requiring a quest: For those long, lonely journeys, there's no better reliable fellow than a companion.{nl}They're obedient, always with you... and most of all they're adorable.
Untuk mereka yang melakukan perjalanan jauh dan kesepian, tiada teman yang lebih baik selain companion.{nl}Mereka patuh, setia... dan yang terbaik dari semuanya ialah mereka menggemaskan.

Please select the user requiring a quest: These buddies can really help you in exciting and nerve-wrecking battles.{nl}You can make them wait while you fight and you can train them, too.{nl}
Mereka dapat membantumu dalam pertempuran yang mendebarkan.{nl}Kamu bisa membuat mereka menunggumu sementara waktu dan kamu dapat melatih mereka, juga.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: Oh, I almost forgot! Not every class can ride on all the companions I sell.{nl}You see, these buddies have preferences just like us.{nl}They might not be able to talk, but they have feelings just like everyone else.
Oh, aku hampir lupa! Tidak semua class bisa mengendarai companion yang saja jual.{nl}Lihatlah, mereka memiliki kesukaan sama seperti kita.{nl}Mereka mungkin tidak bisa bicara, tetapi mereka juga memiliki perasaan sama halnya seperti manusia.

Please select the user requiring a quest: I'm selling very special items you won't see anywhere else.{nl}Where do I get them, you ask? That's a secret.
Aku menjual special item yang tidak akan kamu lihat di tempat lainnya.{nl}Darimana aku mendapatkannya? Itu rahasia.

Please select the user requiring a quest: I think a demon base could have documents about the giant bracken.

Jadi proteksi magic circle di sekitar kuali telah menghilang?{nl}Kamu harus pergi sekarang dan hancurkan kuali itu sebelum para demon{nl} mengetahui tentang hilangnya magic cirlce.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Just wait for a while... I'm going to focus.
Tunggu sebentar... aku akan memfokuskannya.

Please select the user requiring a quest: 331st day of the War{nl}-{nl}No matter how this war ends, if given the chance, I want to kill the chancellor.{nl}If we emerge victorious, I will ask Ruklys to have me execute him, and if we fail, I will at least want to charge at his barricade and stab his chest with a blade; even if I die in the process.{nl}Eminent has started to take over the Earth Tower while leading the demons.{nl}As a human being, how dare he join forces with the demons...?
Hari perang ke-331{nl}-{nl}Tidak peduli bagaimana perang ini akan berakhir, jika aku diberi kesempatan, aku ingin membunuh chancellor itu{nl}Jika kami menang, aku akan meminta Ruklys agar aku bisa mengeksekusinya, dan jika kami kalah, setidaknya aku akan menerobos barikadenya dan menusuk dadanya dengan pisau; walaupun aku harus mati saat itu.{nl}Eminent mulai mengambil alih Earth Tower dengan memimpin para demon.{nl} Sebagai manusia, beraninya ia bekerja sama dengan para demon...?

The springs of Karolis menyembunyikan kisah pahlawan yang tidak begitu dikenal{nl}-{nl} Karolis... Ia adalah murid favorit Tesla, Dievdirbys yang paling terkenal{nl}Diperintahkan oleh Goddess Ausrine, Tesla telah mengukir beberapa patung Spirit-Leading Owl.{nl}

Karolis menatap gadis itu dan berkata,{nl}"Aku akan memberimu nyawaku, jika kamu memberiku kekuatan untuk melindungimu."{nl}Dengan ratapan sedih di wajahnya, gadis itu menggelengkan kepalanya, namun Karolis tidak menyerah.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: And so, with a reluctant nod of the girl's head, Karolis' body began to glow as it turned into a tree.{nl}The light radiating from him turned all the demons in the forest to ashes and drove away all evil energy within it.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: The girl left in tears, and the forest once charged with evil forces was now filled with divine energy.{nl}Karolis' traces can be found to this day.{nl}Letas' holy trees are descendants of the tree Karolis was turned into.{nl}
Gadis yang ditinggalkannya menangis, dan hutan yang di kelilingi kekuatan jahat kini penuh dengan energi suci.{nl}Jejak Karolis dapat ditemukan sampai hari ini.{nl}Letas holy tree adalah keturunan dari Karolis yang berubah menjadi pohon.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: To this day, Karolis protects the forest.{nl}He was never able to become the great Dievdirbys he had dreamed of, but his sacrifice lives on.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: Koru Jungle, Knidos Jungle and Dadan Jungle are all known for their herbs, but particularly for their bracken.{nl}The night dew gathers in their small, closely arranged leaves, creating a fantastic sight when the first rays of light shine on them every morning.{nl}
Koru Jungle, Knidos Jungle dan Dadan Jungle semua dikenal karena tumbuh-tumbuhannya, terutama untuk tanaman pakis mereka.{nl}Embun malam terkumpul pada dedaunannya yang erat, menciptakan pemandangan yang fantastis ketika cahaya pertama menyinari mereka setiap paginya.{nl}

Ashaq Underground Prison adalah penjara yang tersisa dari beberapa penjara lain di bagian selatan King Kadumel's kingdom.{nl}Meskipun berhubungan dengan Ruklys Civil War dan tirani King Kadumel, bangunan ini tetap dipertahankan selama bertahun-tahun untuk berbagai tujuan selain dari penjara.{nl}

Great as it was, it did not survive Medzio Diena unscathed.{nl}Large tree roots spreaded throughout Orsha, demolishing the city's mighty walls and causing an earthquake of tremendous magnitude.{nl}The disaster killed the lord of Orsha and all his successors, merely sparing his only daughter, who is currently in charge of the city.
Orsha, kota perdagangan. Sangat besar, namun tetap mengalami kerusakan ketika Medzio Diena.{nl}Akar pohon besar yang menyebar di seluruh Orsha, menghancurkan dinding perkasanya dan menyebabkan gempa bumi berkekuatan besar.{nl}Bencana itu menewaskan pemimpin Orsha dan semua penerusnya, hanya putri satu-satunya, yang saat ini bertanggung jawab atas kota ini.

Tidak seperti Goddess  lainnya, Laima, Goddess  takdir dan prediksi masa depan, hanya ada di dalam catatan.{nl}Goddess Laima sangatlah jarang bertemu dengan manusia dan begitu juga blessingnya, membuatnya kurang dikenal meskipun salah satu dari Goddess  utama.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: Despite this, the statue of Goddess Laima in Zeraha is universally admired for its tremendous size and beauty.{nl}Some believe that in ancient times there could have existed a hidden city, while others say the city was built in a single day by the power of the goddess.{nl}
Meskipun demikian, patung Goddess Laima di Zeraha secara umum sangat dikagumi karena ukuran dan keindahannya yang luar biasa.{nl}Beberapa diantaranya percaya bahwa di zaman dahulu itu adalah sebuah kota yang tersembunyi, sementara yang lain berpendapat kota itu hanya dibangun dalam satu hari dengan kekuatan Goddess .{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: The Correct Classification of Demons and Monsters
Klasifikasi Tepat Para Demon dan Monster

Please select the user requiring a quest: There is no exact way to classify demons and monsters based on external appearance.{nl}Those familiar with monsters can often distinguish them from demons, however this knowledge comes merely from experience and not from the application of general principles.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: There is one fundamental internal difference between demons and regular monsters.{nl}Demons possess a mind capable of producing thoughts, among which is their clear malevolence towards humans.
Ada satu perbedaan internal yang mendasar antara para demon dan monster biasa.{nl} Para demon memiliki daya pikir yang mampu menghasilkan sesuatu, di antaranya adalah kedengkian mereka terhadap manusia.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Ours was a peaceful kingdom. There was nothing we lacked and people were happy.{nl}Every year we celebrated the spring festival and the goddesses answered our prayers.{nl}But eventually, more and more of our prayers started being left unanswered.{nl}Was it an omen? Suddenly, in the center of the capital an enormous tree sprouted up from the ground and started to spread out.{nl}
Kerajaan kami damai. Tidak kekurangan apapun dan penduduknya sangat bahagia.{nl}Setiap tahun kami merayakan festival musim semi dan para Goddess  menjawab doa-doa kami.{nl}Dan kemudian, tiba-tiba doa-doa kami mulai tidak dijawab.{nl}Apa ini pertanda? Tiba-tiba, di tengah ibukota sebuah pohon besar tumbuh dari bawah tanah dan mulai menyebar.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: Within moments, the capital was destroyed beyond recognition and many had to face the loss of loved ones.{nl}After the initial shock, people started to run, trying to escape the source of the disaster.{nl}But it was far from over.{nl}
Dengan sekejap, ibukota hancur diluar dugaan dan banyak orang yang harus kehilangan orang yang dicintainya.{nl}Setelah goncangan awal, orang mulai berlarian, mencoba melarikan diri dari sumber bencana.{nl}Namun itu belumlah selesai.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: The colossal tree spread out its fully-bloomed flowers and started to engulf those trying to escape.{nl}Soon the capital had completely collapsed. The tremendous aftermath extended the disaster to many other cities.{nl}

Para Goddess masih menghilang.{nl}Para monster terus meneror dunia dan kota-kota yang terkena bencana belum direkonstruksi kembali.{nl}Kami masih berjuang dengan sedikitnya supply, namun kami terus berusaha untuk kembali ke kehidupan normal kami sebisa mungkin.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: Book written in Runic Characters
Book written in Runic Characters

Please select the user requiring a quest: This is a story about the nearly forgotten runic characters.{nl}Runic characters had been used since before the foundation of the kingdom by smaller northern tribes.{nl}Peculiarly, these people believed that the characters held magical powers.{nl}That's the reason why the northern people spent a long time to find those powers.{nl}
Ini adalah cerita tentang Runic character yang nyaris terlupakan.{nl}Runic character telah dipakai sebelum kerajaan dibangun oleh suku-suku kecil dari utara.{nl}Secara khusus, orang-orang percaya bahwa karakter-karakter itu memiliki kekuatan magis.{nl}Itulah kenapa orang-orang dari utara sepenjang waktu mencari kekuatan itu.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: Finally, a person was able to find the powers dwelling in the runic characters.{nl}They do not have any powers by themselves, but they are a channel for powers that can only be manifested through them...{nl}That was the secret behind the runic characters.{nl}
Akhirnya, seseorang dapat menemukan kekuatan yang berasal dari runic characters.{nl}Mereka tidak memiliki kekuatan dari dirinya sendiri, tapi mereka menyalurkan kekuatan yang hanya bisa diwujudkan diantara mereka...{nl}Itulah rahasia dibalik runic characters.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: He went straight to Goddess Saule and told her of the hidden powers of the runic characters, and the goddess rejoiced and blessed him.{nl}
Dia langsung menemui Goddess Saule dan menceritakan tentang kekuatan tersembunyi dari runic characters, goddesspun gembira dan mensyukurinya.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: People came to call him a 'Rune Caster'.{nl}He became the first Rune Caster Master and fostered many more Rune Casters.{nl}He also created the Rune Stone so that the new Rune Casters would easily be able to use runic characters.{nl}
Orang menyebutnya 'Rune Caster'.{nl}Dia menjadi Rune Caster Master pertama dan membimbing Rune Casters lainnya.{nl}Dia juga menciptakan Rune Stone supaya Rune Caster baru akan lebih mudah menggunakan kekuatan runic characters.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: One day, he vanished leaving only his Rune Stone behind.{nl}The Rune Stone he left behind has become a symbol of the way of the Rune Caster and has been passed down from master to master.
Suatu hari dia kehilangan Rune Stone satu-satunya yang ia miliki.{nl}Rune Stone itu telah menjadi simbol dari Rune Caster lainnya dan telah diturunkan dari master ke master.

Please select the user requiring a quest: People often say that the goddesses are always with us.{nl}This is right not only in a spiritual sense but also a practical sense.{nl}That's because it symbolizes the fact that the goddesses are tending over us from their abodes.{nl}
Orang-orang sering berkata bahwa goddess selalu bersama kita.{nl}Tidak hanya untuk hal yang bersifat spiriual saja, tapi untuk hal bersifat fisik juga.{nl}Karena merupakan simbol dari bukti  bahwa goddesses yang melindungi kita.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: {nl}For instance, it is said that Goddess Vibora manages a massive library only permitted to the goddesses.{nl}This library is also the dwelling place of Goddess Vibora.{nl}
{nl}Contohnya, dikatakan bahwa Goddess Vibora mengelola perpustakaan besar yang hanya diizinkan untuk para goddess.{nl}Perpustakaan ini juga merupakan tempat bersemayamnya Goddess Vibora.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: {nl}Another example is the residence of Goddess Jurate which is rumored to be on a mysterious sea where human ships cannot reach.{nl}They say that a ship larger than most islands is the residence of Goddess Jurate.{nl}
{nl}Contoh lain adalah tentang tempat tinggal Goddess Jurate yang rumornya di sebuah lautan misterius dimana perahu manusia tidak bisa mencapainya.{nl}Mereka bilang tentang sebuah kapal yang besarnya melebihi sebuah pulau adalah tempat tinggal Goddess Jurate.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: {nl}It is said that even Goddess Vakarine that goes around numerous locations has her own abode.{nl}Some say that there is a demon prison in a dimension that we do not know of, and that is the domain of Goddess Vakarine. {nl}But that is only one of the many locations that Goddess Vakarine visits.{nl}
{nl}dikatakan juga bahwa Goddess Vakarine yang sering berpindah-pindah tempatpun memiliki tempat tinggal.{nl}Beberapa mengatakan bahwa terdapat demon prison di sebuah dimensi yang tidak bisa kita ketahui, dan itulah daerah kekuasaan dari Goddess Vakarine. {nl}Tapi itu hanya salah satu tempat tinggal Goddess Vakarine yang pernah dikunjungi.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: {nl}There are also legends that Goddess Laima has a palace deep underground where nobody knows of.{nl}There is no way to find it, it is also said that the Demon Goddess Giltine also resides there.
{nl}Ada juga Legenda tentang Goddess Laima yang tinggal di bawah tanah dan tidak seorangpun mengetahuinya.{nl}Tiada cara untuk menemukannya, dikatakan juga bahwa Demon Goddess Giltine tinggal di sana.

Please select the user requiring a quest: The Rune Stone...{nl}I haven't heard of that in a long time.{nl}
Rune Stone...{nl}Setelah sekian lama aku berlum pernah mendengar hal ini lagi.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: In the past, I've met a person that was searching for the {nl}special powers hidden within the runic characters.{nl}He was filled with a pure passion for the task.{nl}
Dulu aku pernah bertemu seseorang yang mencari {nl}special powers tersembunyi bersama runic characters.{nl}Dia memiliki hasrat yang tinggi akan tugasnya.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: He eventually found the hidden powers in the runic characters and became the first Rune Caster.{nl}A channel for power... The power of the runic characters was their {nl}ability to allow the casters to realized their strength through them.{nl}
Dia akhirnya menemukan hidden powers pada runic characters dan menjadi Rune Caster pertama.{nl}Channel for power... Kekuatan runic characters adalah {nl}kemampuannya untuk dapat mewujudkan kekuatan dia sebenarnya.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: He crafted a Rune Stone to let others use the powers of the Rune Stone with easier access.{nl}Although his Rune Stone was nothing extraordinary, the following generations of {nl}Rune Caster Masters have carefully guarded his Rune Stone out of respect...{nl}
Dia menciptakan Rune Stone supaya orang lain dapat menggunakan Rune Stone lebih mudah.{nl}Karena Rune Stone merupakan sesuatu yang sangat luar biasa, generasi berikutnya {nl}Rune Caster Masters harus menjaga Rune Stone dengan baik...{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: Unfortunately his Rune Stone was lost during the Petrified City incident.{nl}That is why the Rune Caster Master is still looking for his Rune Stone.{nl}
Sayangnya Rune Stone miliknya hilang saat peristiwa Petrified City.{nl}Itulah kenapa Rune Caster Master masih mencari Rune Stone tersebut.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: The fact that you've come to me with knowledge of the Rune Stone... {nl}Perhaps it means that you were led here by its powers.
Kenyataannya kamu telah datang bersama pengetahuanmu tentang Rune Stone... {nl}Bisa jadi kamu telah dituntun untuk menuju kemari oleh kekuatan ini.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Yes. Although it is an old tale...{nl}I do have an idea of where the Rune Stone may be.{nl}{nl}
Ya. Meskipun ini kisah yang lama...{nl}Aku dapat mengetahui dimana kemungkinan Rune Stone itu berada.{nl}{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: The last place I sensed the Rune Stone was at the Royal Mausoleum.{nl}But that was a long time ago... I don't recall exactly where I sensed it.{nl}
Tempat terakhir yang kurasakan kehadirannya adalah di Royal Mausoleum.{nl}Tapi itu sudah lama sekali... Aku tidak ingat persis dimana aku merasakannya.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: I remember the traveler that came to me asking for a blessing a few hundred years ago.{nl}He said that he had seen a mysterious stone with {nl}strange characters engraved on it near a waterfall.{nl}
Aku ingat traveler yang datang padaku meminta blessing beberapa ratus tahun lalu.{nl}Dia bilang telah melihat sebuah batu misterius di dekat air terjun {nl}dengan tulisan aneh terukir.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: Unfortunately I was not able to know about what was occurring{nl}around the world after I had resolved to protect the revelation.{nl}Perhaps humans may know more about the whereabouts of the Rune Stone than I do.{nl}
Sayangnya aku tidak dapat mengetahui apa yang terjadi{nl} di seluruh dunia setelah saya memutuskan untuk melindungi revelation.{nl}Mungkin manusia lebih tahu tentang keberadaan Rune Stone itu daripada aku.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: Yes. Maybe a human family that has survived for a long time such as the Jonas family...{nl}Someone that has eternal life like the Amjinas is sure to know something.
Mungkin sebuah keluarga yang telah hidup dalam waktu yang lama seperti Jonas family...{nl}Seseorang yang hidup abadi seperti Amjinas pasti mengetahuinya.

Please select the user requiring a quest: You mentioned 'Rune Stone', didn't you?{nl}Ah, could it be...{nl}
Kamu bilang 'Rune Stone' ?{nl}Ahh .. mungkinkah...{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: If you are talking about a stone with strange characters engraved on it, yes I do have one.{nl}I don't know how long it has been, but it has been in {nl}the possession of the Jonas family for generations.{nl}
Jika kamu berbicara tentang batu dengan ukiran aneh, ya â€¦ aku punya.{nl}Tak tahu berapa lama {nl}tapi dimiliki oleh Jonas family beberapa generasi.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: But it is treated as rubbish since there is no way of knowing what it is used for.{nl}Now I know it is Rune Stone thanks to you.{nl}
Tapi sudah dianggap sampah karena tidak tahu untuk apa gunanya.{nl}Sekarang aku tahu itu adalah Rune Stone, terima kasih.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: Why are you searching for it though?
Kenapa kamu tertarik sekali?

Please select the user requiring a quest: I see.{nl}It is useless in our hands, so we'll give it to you if you absolutely need it.{nl}
Ohh begitu.{nl}bagi kami ini tidak berguna, akan kuberikan padamu jika memang kamu membutuhkannya.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: No matter how valuable an object may be, {nl}it has to be in the hands of someone that needs it to be worth anything.
Tak peduli seberapa berharganya benda itu, {nl}mesti di tangan yang memang benar-benar membutuhkannya.

Please select the user requiring a quest: You've come here in search of the Rune Stone?{nl}
Kami kemari untuk mencari Rune Stone?{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: I don't know where you've heard of it, but I do have one.{nl}I threw a tantrum when I was young to get it when {nl}it was gifted to the Winterspoon family long ago.{nl}
Aku tidak tahu darimana kamu mengetahuinya, tapi aku memang memilikinya{nl}Aku susah payah mendapatkannya {nl}ketika dihadiahkan pada Winterspoon family pada waktu itu.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: Though, that's already a few hundred years ago.{nl}Now where did I put it...
Meskipun, itu sudah beberapa ratus tahun yang lalu.{nl}Sekarang dimana aku menyimpannya...

Please select the user requiring a quest: Oh, as it happens, I have it right here.{nl}I have no use for it, so you may have it if you need it.{nl}
Ohh, di sini.{nl}Aku tidak membutuhkannya, kamu boleh memilkinya jika memang perlu.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: It may have been destined for you since you are the first person {nl}to seek something that nobody wanted for hundreds of years.{nl}As a handler of time, I am thinking that perhaps it was a future promised in the past.
Mungkin ini jodohmu, karena kamu yang pertama kali memintanya {nl}mencari sesuatu yang tidak dicari orang bertahun-tahun.{nl}Sebagai pengendali waktu, mungkin itu masa depan yang dijanjikan di masa lalu.

Please select the user requiring a quest: I can't seem to find where I've put it.{nl}I'll keep an eye out for it, so would you mind coming back later?
Aku lupa dimana menyimpannya.{nl}Akan kuingat-ingat dulu, maukah kembali lagi nanti?

Please select the user requiring a quest: Do you mean the Rune Stone?{nl}
Maksudmu Rune Stone?{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: I don't have anything like that...{nl}But I do have something that comes to mind.{nl}
Aku tidak punya barang semacam ntu...{nl}Tapi aku punya sesuatu yang muncul dalam benakku.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: There is a place in West Siauliai Woods that cannot be accessed through ordinary means.{nl}I had faintly sensed a mysterious aura for a few hundred years...{nl}But I couldn't find a way to get there.{nl}
Ada satu tempat di West Siauliai Woods yang tidak bisa diakses dengan cara biasa.{nl}Selama bertaun-taun aku sering merasakan adanya aura misterius di sekitar situ...{nl}Tapi tak tahu caranya pergi ke sana.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: Perhaps the item you are searching for may be there.{nl}How about taking a look if you know how to get there?
Mungkin barang yang kamu cari ada di sana.{nl}Jika kamu tahu cara masuk ke sana, bisakah kamu memeriksanya?

Please select the user requiring a quest: Do you know that there is a place in West Siauliai Woods {nl}that cannot be accessed by ordinary means?{nl}I had sensed a mysterious aura there for hundreds of years.{nl}
Tahukah kamu suatu tempat di West Siauliai Woods {nl}yang tidak bisa diakses dengan cara biasa?{nl}Selama bertaun-taun aku sering merasakan adanya aura misterius di sekitar situ....{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: I don't know how to get there, or what to expect to find there.{nl}You might be able to find something if you find a way to get there.
Aku tak tahu caranya ke sana, dan ada apa sebenarnya di sana.{nl}Mungkin kamu bisa menemukan sesuatu jika dapat masuk ke sana.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Rune Stone
Rune Stone

Please select the user requiring a quest: (Unrecognizable characters are glowing.)
(Sesuatu yang tidak dikenali bersinar.)

Please select the user requiring a quest: (It seems as if you require more Rune Stones.)
(Kamu butuh Rune Stones lainnya.)

Please select the user requiring a quest: Something glowing seems to be embedded behind the tombstone.{nl}Take it out?
Sesuatu bersinar di belakang tombstone.{nl}Periksalah?

Please select the user requiring a quest: You can see many interesting things if you sit here.{nl}
Kamu akan menemukan banyak sesuatu yang menarik di sana.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: Not too long ago, a lady that seemed to be a mage came to ask something strange.{nl}I think she was looking for a stone engraved with characters that glow blue or something?{nl}
Beberapa waktu yang lalu, seorang mage perempuan menanyakan sesuatu yang aneh.{nl}Sepertinya dia mencari batu yang bersinar berwarna biru atau sesuatu yang lain?{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: I said I didn't know anything of the sort since I have never seen anything similar.{nl}She said something about going somewhere past Escanciu Village... I can't quite recall.
Aku bilang aku tidak tahu, karena belum pernah melihat sesuatu seperti itu.{nl}Dia bilang ada sesuatu menuju ke Escanciu Village... Aku tidak begitu ingat.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Rune Caster Master
Rune Caster Master

Please select the user requiring a quest: Eh? Why am I sensing rune powers in you?{nl}
Eh? Kenapa aku merasa ada rune powers dalam dirimu?{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: Goodness! {nl}That is the Rune Stone of the first Rune Caster Master, isn't it?{nl}
Ya Tuhan! {nl}Ini Rune Stone dari Rune Caster Master pertama itu kan?{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: How did you manage to find it?{nl}I've been looking all over for it...{nl}
Bagaimana bisa kamu menemukannya?{nl}Aku telah mencarinya sekian lama...{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: That Rune Stone... Could you give it to me, please?{nl}Although it may not mean too much to ordinary people, {nl}it means a lot to Rune Caster Masters.
Rune Stone itu ... Berikanlah padaku?{nl}Meskipun mungkin tidak berarti terlalu banyak untuk orang-orang biasa, {nl}ini sangat berarti bagi para Rune Caster Master.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Thank you so much.{nl}The Rune Stone of the first Rune Caster Master is finally back in {nl}the hands of Rune Casters after hundreds of years thanks to you.{nl}
Terima kasih banyak.{nl}Rune Stone of the first Rune Caster Master akhirnya ditemukan kembali {nl}Terima kasih banyak.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: I don't know if it is sufficient as a reward, but let me teach you a little about runic characters.{nl}While extremely rare, there are some books written in runic characters.{nl}
Aku tak tahu ini cukup atau tidak sebagai hadiah buatmu, tapi aku akan mengajarkanmu sedikit tentang runic characters.{nl}Meskipun jarang, ada beberapa buku yang menulis tentang runic characters.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: Perhaps if your magic is compatible with the runic characters...{nl}You may be able to become a Rune Caster.{nl}
Mungkin jika magicmu berhubungan dengan runic characters...{nl}Kamu dapat menjadi seorang Rune Caster.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: No, I am certain that you will be able to become a Rune Caster.{nl}I think that the will of the runic characters led you here to me.{nl}
Aku yakin kamu bisa menjadi seorang Rune Caster.{nl}Kehendak dari runic characterlah yang membawamu kemari.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: Rune Casters can cast powerful magic through Rune Stones.{nl}However, it does take a long time to gather the required magic.{nl}
Rune Casters mampu mengeluarkan kekuatan yang besar melalui Rune Stones.{nl}Tapi bagaimanapun juga membutuhkan waktu yang lama untuk bisa menguasainya.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: Oh... Have I been talking too much about Rune Casters?{nl}My bad, but thank you so much for finding the Rune Stone.{nl}
Oh... Aku terlalu banyak bicara tentang Rune Casters{nl}Tapi terima kasih banyak telah mendapatkan kembali Rune Stone.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: Come back to me if you wish to become a Rune Caster.{nl}
Kembalilah jika kamu berminat menjadi seorang Rune Caster.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: I don't know if you could call it a reward, but I will teach you some runic characters.{nl}Although quite rare, there are occasionally some books written in runic characters.{nl}
Katakanlah ini sebuah hadiah, aku akan mengajarkanmu runic characters.{nl}Meskipun jarang, ada beberapa buku yang menulis tentang runic characters.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: You may be able to obtain important information from long ago.{nl}Not a bad deal, don't you agree?
Kamu akan mampu mencari informasi tentang masa lalu.{nl}Menarik kan?

Please select the user requiring a quest: Oh, the youth. Oh, the beautiful...{nl}To introduce my poor self, I am a a mere dandelion seed wandering as the wind takes me.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: My song flows as the wind blows, as your soul glitters brightly...{nl}Do you have an interest in the songs of this poor bard?{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: But poor old me. {nl}Though I wish to tell you, your lonesome friend must soon leave. {nl}Farewell...

Please select the user requiring a quest: It's all done!{nl}Now all we have to do is blow it up!

Please select the user requiring a quest: And right before his eyes, the lead nugget prize let out a sparkle and in a moment clearly became gold. {nl} The old Alchemist now snickered, 'Now you owe me one gold nugget, be sure to bring it.' {nl} Modestas protested, but as much as he looked, what the old Alchemist now held was clearly no longer lead. {nl}
Tepat di depan matanya, bongkahan yang berkilau dan dalam sekejap telah menjadi gold. {nl}Si Old Alchemist menyeringai, 'Sekarang Kamu berhutang padaku sebongkah emas, pastikan kamu membawanya.' {nl} Modestas protes, tapi seperti apa yang terlihat, apa yang old Alchemist pegang sudah tidak ada lagi. {nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: Kupole Lhuta
Kupole Lhuta

Please select the user requiring a quest: Revelator, I've been waiting for you.{nl}Goddess Zemyna is hiding somewhere in this Earth Tower.
Savior, Aku telah menunggumu.{nl}Goddess Zemyna bersembunyi di sekitar Earth Tower ini.

Please select the user requiring a quest: After the day in which you humans call Medzio Diena...{nl}Goddess Zemyna has hidden herself from the human realm.{nl}
Setelah peristiwa Medzio Diena...{nl}Goddess Zemyna mengucilkan dirinya dari kehidupan manusia.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: The life of humans and the fertility of vegetation...{nl}Medzio Diena must have been a great woe for the goddess of fertility.
Kehidupan manusia dan kesuburan vegetasi...{nl}Medzio Diena merupakan bencana besar bagi goddess of fertility.

Please select the user requiring a quest: We Kupoles have asked for her presence as the humans are longing for her...{nl}But Goddess Zemyna is obstinately refusing to meet us.{nl}
Kami sangat merindukan kehadirannya..{nl}Tapi Goddess Zemyna bersikeras tidak mau menemui kami.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: To make things worse, the demons have started to attack the Earth Tower.{nl}It has become hard to even request a meeting with her because of the attacks.
Para demon telah mulai menyerang Earth Tower.{nl}Gegara mereka jadi semakin sulit untuk menemui Zemyna.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Revelator, please find Goddess Zemyna.{nl}Maybe you will be able to change the goddess' mind.
Savior, tolong temui Goddess Zemyna.{nl}Mungkin dengan kehadiranmu dia mau berubah pikiran.

Please select the user requiring a quest: If it helps finding Goddess Zemyna...{nl}I'll tell you what I know about the Earth Tower.
Jika bisa membantu menemukan Goddess Zemyna...{nl}Akan kuceritakan yang kutahu tentang Earth Tower.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Unfortunately, there is not much I can tell you about Goddess Zemyna.{nl}I am sorry.
Sayangnya tidak terlalu banyak yang bisa kukatakan tentang Goddess Zemyna.{nl}Maaf.

Please select the user requiring a quest: I pray that you will be able to meet Goddess Zemyna.
Aku berdo'a semoga kamu bisa bertemu Goddess Zemyna.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Relic Collector
Relic Collector

Please select the user requiring a quest: They say that there are many artifacts from unknown periods in the Earth Tower.{nl}If you find something, how about exchanging for something I have?
Mereka bilang banyak artifact dari periode yang tidak diketahui di Earth Tower.{nl}Jika menemukan sesuatu, kita bisa bertukar informasi?

Please select the user requiring a quest: There is someone who will want what we have even if the world ends.{nl}Our job is to supply it if there is a demand for it.
Ada seseorang yang menginginkan apa yang kita miliki, meskipun sampai akhir dunia.{nl}Tugas kita ada menyiapkannya, selama masih ada permintaan.

Please select the user requiring a quest: There is almost nothing known about the Istora Ruins.{nl}The fact that they were discovered thanks to being pushed up after Medzio Diena is about it.{nl}
Nyaris tidak ada yang diketahui tentang Istora Ruins.{nl}Diketemukan setelah peristiwa Medzio Diena .{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: Then some adventures came to know about the Earth Tower here.{nl}It won't even open unless you are a Revelator.{nl}
Lalu beberapa adventure datang untuk mencari tahu tentang Earth Tower di sini.{nl}Tapi tetap tidak akan dibuka meskipun kamu seorang Savior.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: That's why we're making a living selling various of items to Revelators.{nl}Since only Revelators can carry relics from inside the tower.
Itulah kenapa kita menjual item-item khusus untuk para Savior.{nl}Karena hanya Savior yang bisa mengambil relic dari dalam tower.

Please select the user requiring a quest: One thousand and two hundred years ago...{nl}This tower has been built by the remaining vestiges of an ancient era forgetten by humans.{nl}
Seribu duaratus tahun yang lalu...{nl}Tower dini dibangun oleh vestiges of an ancient yang tersisa oleh manusia pada masa yang terlupakan.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: A long time ago, the humans that lived together with the goddesses...{nl}They created the tower out of desire for the goddesses.{nl}
Dahulu kala manusia hidup berdampingan bersama para goddess...{nl}Mereka membuat tower untuk para goddess.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: But time erased even the memories of the tower.{nl}A thousand years after the rule of King Zachariel, only Zemyna is hiding here now.
Waktu telah menghapus semua tower beserta kenangan-kenangannya.{nl}Seribu tahun setelah kekuasaan King Zachariel, hanya Zemyna yang tinggal di sini.

Please select the user requiring a quest: It is certain that Goddess Zemyna is in the tower...{nl}But unfortunately, even I do not know where she could be.{nl}
Bisa dipastikan Goddess Zemyna tinggal di dalam tower ini...{nl}Sayangnya aku tidak tahu dimana dia berada.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: As Goddess Zemyna does not wish to see anybody...{nl}I assume she is in the innermost depths of the tower.
Goddess Zemyna memang tidak ingin bertemu dengan siapapun...{nl}Aku kira Dia berada di tempat terdalam di tower ini.
